Use in the treatment of all your patients for prognosis and indication, because in it you are assisted with acquiring fame and memory, praise and glory.
O, filhs, Dieus en vos spire le sieu entendement e no oste a vos direccio e proteccio, quar aquo es en la sua ma.	Oh sons, God inspire your understanding and do not abandon you in direction and protection, for it is in His hands.
E yeu e ordenat aquest capitol distingent per capitols segon que precedit en le capitol de cauteris, de la cura del cap entro als pes, per que sia a vos alleujat aquo que demandatz de aquo e del qual havetz necessitat.	And this chapter is divided into sections according to what preceded in the chapter on cauteries, the care of the head down to the feet, so that you may be relieved of what you seek and for which you have need.
Capitol primier.	Chapter First.
De la curacio de aygua la qual es contenguda en le cap dels enfantz.	On the treatment of water contained in the head of infants.
Sapias que aquesta malautia motas veguadas endeve als enfantz deves le enfantament e quan la noyrissa estrenh le cap del enfant ses livitat.	Know that this disease, which frequently occurs in infants, is caused by the infant's birth and when the mother's head of the infant is not covered.
E alcunas veguadas endeve per causa amaguada la qual no es saubuda.	And sometimes it occurs due to hidden causes that are not known.
Mays yeu no vi aquesta malautia sino en les enfantz; e a totz aquels les quals yeu vi se coytec la mort, e per ayssi es a mi vist layssada obra en aquels.	I do not see this disease except in infants; and all those whom I have seen it afflicted by, it has been a sign of death, and thus it seems to me to be a lost work in them.
E yeu e vist que un enfant le cap del qual era d’aygua omplit, e·l cap de lu era totjorn ayssi magnificat entro que ceser no podia sobre si meteys per la grandesa del sieu cap, e mays que la humiditat fe aucmentada entro que foc mort.	I have seen an infant whose head was filled with water, and his head was thus magnified until it could not cease increasing in size due to the greatness of his head, and moreover the moisture made it worse until death by fire ensued.
E aquesta humiditat o es agreguada entre la codena e l’os, o es agreguada dejos le os sobre le ciphac.	And this moisture is either added between the skull and the bone, or it is added beneath the bones on the forehead.
Quar la operacio en aquel si la humiditat es entre la codena e l’os e le apostema es pauc, lahoras cove que tu fendas en le mieg loc del cap am una fissura en la latitut, e sia la longitut de la fissura cays dos notz entro que corra la humiditat, e aquesta es la forma del spatum:	Because the operation in this case is when the moisture is between the skull and the bone, and the abscess is small, then it is necessary for you to make an incision in the middle of the head with a fissure along its length, and let the length of the fissure be two knuckles deep until the moisture runs out, and this is the shape of the spoon:
E donc si la humiditat es mays augmentada e l’apostema es major, lahoras son aqui dos fissuras segon aquesta manieyra:	And so if the moisture is more increased and the abscess is larger, here are two incisions according to this method:
E si la humiditat es dejos le os, senhal de lu es que tu vezes la comissuras del cap ubertas de tota partida e l’aygua es spremuda quan tu compremes aquela am la tieua ma a las partidas dedintz e no es aquo a tu amaguat.	And if the moisture is beneath the bones, it is a sign that you see the joints of the head opened up on all sides and water is pressed out when you compress them with your hand from inside the joints and it is not hidden from you.
Cove que tu fendas en le mieg loc del cap am tres fissuras segon aquesta manieyra:	It is necessary for you to make three incisions in the middle of the head according to this method:
e aprop la inscizio extratz ne tota la humiditat; e aprop strenh las fissuras am draps e plumassols; e aprop enbroca aquo de sobre am vi e oli entro al quint dia, e aprop deslia le liament e cura la plagua am tentas e enguentz, e strenh le cap am equalitat; e mange le malaute am vianda secca de pauca humiditat entro que·l membre sia confortat e sanat.	Pull out all the moisture; strengthen the incisions with cloths and feathers; bind it up with oil for five days, remove the bandage and treat the wound with ointments and liniments, keep the head raised with a pillow; feed the patient with dry food of little moisture until the limb is comforted and healed.
E es autra manieyra de incisio, que consideras hon apar la magnitut del apostema e la colleccio de l’aygua, quar alcunas veguadas es mays en le occipicii, o en la partida denant, o en la destra, o en la sinistra; e donc aten am la incizio on appar le apostema e la replecio de l’aygua, e fen aquo segon que a tu es miels possible.	Another method of incision is to consider the size of the abscess and the collection of water, for sometimes it is more in the occipital region or in front, or on the right, or on the left; and so pay attention to the incision where the abscess and repleting of the water appears, and do as is best possible for you.
Et observa que no inscindas la arteria e endevengua flueys de sanc e mora le malaute per aquel flux de sanc am evacuacio de humiditat.	And beware that you do not incise the artery and cause it to flow with blood and kill the patient due to the flow of blood with the evacuation of moisture.
Capitol .ii.	Chapter II.
De inscisio de las arterias las quals so aprop las aurelhas, apeladas hilasseysse.	On incision of the arteries, which are called auricles.
Capitol segon.	Chapter Third.
Quan endeveno ad alcu catars o raumas als huelhs o al pietz, e es antiquat aquo, e no confereys en aquo la curacio de las medicinas, lahoras la deriera curacio en aquest es incizio de aquelas dos arterias.	When cataracts or ulcers occur in the eyes or feet, and it is an ancient method that does not confer the cure of medicine, then the last resort for this is incision of those two arteries.
E donc cove quan tu vols inscidir aquelas que le malaute raza lo sieu cap, e aprop fregua le loc am drap aspre per so que aparan las arcerias, e aprop sia strengut le col del malaute am alcu drap; e aprop considera on polsa la vena; e les locs de quascuna sobre les locs les quals so aprop las aurelhas depremutz, e tant se occultan sino en alcus homes.	And so when you want to incise those arteries that the patient feels his head, first rub the area with rough cloth so that the arteries appear, and keep the neck of the patient straight with some cloth; consider where the vein pulses; press each location above the locations that are close to the auricles, and these should remain hidden unless in some men.
E aprop senha sobre la arceria am tenta, e aprop inscideys quascuna am le spatum de quascuna partida agut am inscizio pervenient entro al os, e sia aquo per la latitut del cap.	And beware of the artery with a probe, and incise each one with a sharp spoon, which should enter into the bone, and let this be along the length of the head.
E si vols, entromet le spatum dejos la arteria e trenqua aquala a las inciden a las partidas desus.	And if you wish, insert the spoon beneath the artery and break it at the incisions above.
E sia la longitut de la inscizio cays dos ditz ajustatz, quar quan alcuna vena es inscizida le sanc es eyssit am egressio pulsatil, le qual saut deforo per saut frequent.	Let the length of the incision be two fingers adjusted, because when one vein is incised, blood is emitted with a pulsating exit, which jumps out frequently.
Mays si la arceria no apareys al cintiment, lahoras cove que tu mesures de la aurelha la quantitat del spazi de tres ditz, e aprop senha am tenta, e fen entro al os.	However, if the artery does not appear at the incision, it is necessary for you to measure three fingers from the auricle, and beware with a probe, and do so into the bone.
E aquo que cove getar del sanc es quantitat de vi unc., e fort leu ne geta de lu mays o mens, e tot aquo es segon la quantitat la qual appareys de la vertut del malaute e de la replecio de la arceria de lu.	And that which requires the flow of blood is one cupful of wine, And because he does not vomit more or less, and all this is according to the amount that appears of the patient's power and the filling of his bowels.
E aprop considera la plagua, e donc si reman sobre le os alcuna causa del ciphac, lahoras inscindys aquo per so que no endevengua apostema caut.	And also pay attention to the wound, and if any cause of swelling remains on the bone, then cut it to prevent pus from collecting.
E aprop strenh la plagua am plumassols e am liamentz de drap de li, e aprop cura aquela am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And clean the wound with feathers and linen cloth, and then treat it with a poultice until it heals.
Capitol .iii.	Chapter III.
De extraccio de las arcerias las quals so en las templas.	On the extraction of hernias that are in the temples.
Quan ad alcu accideys emigranea antiqua o catertz agutz, per humiditatz agrimonials e per qualiditat en les lacertz des templas, o sodo antiqua vehement e semblantz ad aquels, e es medicat am las manieyras de curacio de medicina e aquo no comfereys, lahoras nos hem sproatz en aquestas malautias extraccio de las arcerias en les templas, o cauterizacio de aquelas ayssi cum havem mostrat.	When an old or new abscess, caused by humid acrimonious substances and qualities in the temples, or a swelling similar to these, and treated with medicines but does not improve, we propose the treatment of extraction of hernias in the temples, or cauterization of such as we have shown.
E la manieyra de la operacio e extracio de aquelas es que·l malaute raza les pels les quals son en les templas; e entenda a la arceria apparent en le templar quar ela es a tu mostrada per le sieu pols, e·s occultada sino en paucs homes per vehemencia de freg.	The method of operation and extraction of those hernias is that the patient shaves the hair from the temples; and understand the hernia in the temple which you have seen by its pulse, and it is hidden except in a few men due to the strength of the swelling.
E si a tu es occultada, lahoras le col del malaute sia strengut am alcun drap; e aprop fregua le loc am un drap aspre o evapora le loc am aygua cauda entro que aparesca a tu la arceria manifestament.	And if it is hidden, then tighten the neck of the patient with some cloth; and rub the area with rough cloth or warm the area with hot water until the hernia appears manifestly.
E lahoras tu pren le spatum del qual aquesta es la forma:	And you take the spoon whose shape is:
E aprop tu scorja la codena am aquel am facilitat entro que pervenguas a la arceria; e aprop geta en lu onti e extratz aquela a las partidas sobiranas entro que extraguas aquela de la codena e descobras aquela de las tunicas las quals so dejos aquela, de tota partida.	And you prepare the knife with ease until you reach the hernia; and open it on one side and extract it at the superior parts until you extract it from the cavity and expose it from the tunics which are beneath it, all around.
Mays si la arteria es subtil, lahoras envolveys aquela am la extremitat del oncii, e aprop inscindeys de aquela una partida segon la quantitat per la qual sian alonguadas las extremitatz de lu e sian contraytas, e no endevindra flux de sanc, quar si no so inscididas no pujara le sanc de tot.	But if the artery is delicate, you envelop it with the tip of the finger, and then make an incision on one side according to the length by which the extremities are extended and contracted, and no blood flow will occur, because if they are not incised, blood cannot be raised from all over.
E aprop evacua del sanc de vi unc. entro a tres.	And evacuate the blood from it. for three.
E si la arceria es gran, lahoras cove que tu lies aquela en dos locs am fiel dopble fort de ceda o am cordas a lonc, e no coyte a lu putrefaccio denant la consolidacio de la plagua e endevengua flux de sanc.	If the hernia is large, then you must tie it in two places with strong cord or sinew, and do not cut it until it rots before the wound heals and blood flow occurs.
E aprop incideys la superfluitat la qual es entre dos liamentz; e fay aquo en aquela hora o aprop autra ora.	And then cut off the excess that is between two poultices, and do so at this time or another time.
E si vols, cauteriza aquela am cauteri entro al os am cauteri cutellar entro que sian incididas las extramitatz de lu, e stara en loc de aquela meteyssa obra.	And if you wish, cauterize it with a cautery to the bone with a cautery knife until the extremities are incised, and remain in that location for that operation.
E es milhor obra sino que·l malaute aia febre o es de escalfada compleccio; quar cauteri es de aquelas causas que ajudan a las humiditatz finidoras, e donc es milhor en juvament.	And it is better if the patient has fever or is in a hot state of complexion, because cauterization helps to dry up moisture, and therefore it is more beneficial.
E cove aprop la extraccio de las arcerias que huomplas le loc de coto antic, e sian pausatz sobre lu polvils decentement fayt, e aprop sia curat am medicinas seccas fazen naysser la carn e am calguas entro que sia sanat.	It is necessary to perform the extraction of hernias in clean and well-prepared areas, and place them on suitable powder, and treat them with dry medications to cause the flesh to heal and with warm water until it heals.
E si mentre obres autra veguada endeventa flux de sanc de la arceria, lahora tu te coyta a restrenger aquel sanc, o am cauteri, o que omplas le loc de coto, e strenh la tua ma entro que sia restreyt le sanc.	And if during another examination the hernia causes blood flow, then you should take steps to restrain the blood, or with a cautery, or by applying a clean cloth, and keep your hand over it until the blood is stopped.
E si deguna causa de aquelas no es a tu present, lahoras pausa le tieu dit sobre le loc entro que·l sanc sia congilat, e enbroca le loc am aygua de vehement fregiditat entro que la acuitat repausa, e sia strengut segon que cove.	And if any cause of those does not present itself to you, then place your hand on the area until the blood clots, and block the area with hot water until the inflammation subsides, and do it as necessary.
E aquo que es pus leugier en extraccio de arceria es que tu cauterizes la vena am aquest cauteri haventz dos cotels, pus que tu has senhat les dos locs am tenta, e depausa quascus, mot ignitz, entro que pervenguan al os e inscindan la vena en dos locs, per so que sia elonguat aquo que es entre las extremitatz de lu, quar no son consolidadas de tot am aquest cauteri.	And the easiest method for hernia extraction is to cauterize the vein with this cautery having two handles, after you have tried both sides and waited, as necessary, until they reach the bone and incise the vein in two places, so that what is between the extremities can be extended, because they are not consolidated by this cautery.
E aquesta es la forma del cauteri:	And here is the shape of the cautery:
E sia la acuitat dels dos cotels esemps.	The distance between the two handles should be the same.
Mays empero si so mendres acuitat que dos cotels es milhor, quar si so agudas cum dos cotels propera a quascuna freg, e no enscideysso la carn am velocitat.	But if it is narrower than two handles that is better, because if it is sharp like two handles close to each other, the flesh will not be cut with speed.
Donc cum en aquels es alcuna grossitut, es tenguda la calor del foc en aquels e la carn es abscindida leugierament.	Therefore, since there is some thickness in those, the heat of the fire should be kept in them and the flesh is cut easily.
E aquesta obra es milhor en tota obra e pus leugiera.	And this operation is better than all other operations and easier.
E sia le spazi le qual es entre dos cotels la quantitat de la grossesa del dit.	And the space that is between the two handles should be equal to the thickness of the finger.
Capitol quart.	Chapter IV.
De la cura de cors de lagremas agudas e aciduas dels huels.	On the treatment of colds with acute and sharp urine in males.
Quan so lagremas aciduas, e es le cors de aquelas venas las quals so sobre le test del cap deforo, e no comfereys en aquo alcuna causa de la curacio de medicina, e vezes la cara del malaute ja enrogesir e sent en le sieu front deambulacio ayssi cum si era deambulacio de formiguas, e·ls huels de aquel so extenuatz, humitz enayssi que ja les pels de lor son conodutz, e las parpelas so scalfadas per la acuitat de las lacrimas, les antics agro mesties en la curacio de aquelas de aquesta operacio, e nompnero aquela curacio am spassa.	When the colds are acidic, and they come from veins above the testicle of the head, and no cause for the cure by medicine is found, and sometimes the face of the patient becomes swollen and he feels a tingling in his forehead like ants are walking on it, and the scrotum of such becomes thin, moist until the skin is visible, and the testicles are scalded by the acidity of the tears, ancient physicians used to treat them with this operation, and I name this treatment as "spassa".
E es que tu comandas al malaute rayre les pels les quals son en le sieu front, e aprop inscideys en le front tres fissuras engualment distans segon la longitut del front.	You command the patient to shave the hairs on their forehead and then make three incisions equally spaced along the length of the forehead.
E si’ la longitut de la fissura cays dos ditz: la una fissura sia engualment distant a la longitut del nas en le mieg loc del front, e la segonda segon la longitut un petit del movement dels lacertz les quals so en le lacrimal, e la tersa del autre part.	And if the length of the incision is two digits: the first incision should be equally distant from the nose in the middle of the forehead, and the second one should be as long as a small joint of the fingers which are at the lacrimal (eye corner), and the third one from the other side.
E guarda te de la incizio de las arcerias las quals so en dos latz, e elongua la tua ma de la continuacio de amdos las mandibulas.	Here's the translation for this sentence:
E si’ l’espazi de quascuna inscizio la quantitat de tres ditz ajustatz.	Here's the translation for this sentence:
E si’ a tu una pessa d’espongua apparelhada o draps seccatz motz am les quals exsiccas le sanc.	Here's the translation for this sentence:
E aprop entremet le spatum de dos agudas extremitatz, del qual aquesta es la forma de la inscisio de lu:	Here's the translation for this sentence:
que es de la partida des templas entro a la segonda inscizio.	What comes from the part between the temples up to the second incision.
Exxcorja am aquel tota la codena la qual es entre dos incizios am le ciphac le qual es sobre le os, e aprop fay aquo de la inscizio migera entro a la segonda inscisio.	Excise the whole piece of bone that lies between two incisions and chisel the one that is on the bone, then place this piece from the middle incision to the second incision.
E aprop stratz ne aquest spatum e entromet en la primieyra inscizio autra vetz un autre instrument le qual es apelat cutellar, agut de una part e del autre no agut.	Then straighten this spatula and insert it into the first incision again with another instrument called a scalpel, sharp on one side and dull on the other.
E pausa le latz de aquel agut deves la carn annexa deves la codena, e le latz de lu leon dintz le os, e empelley aquel entro que pervengua a la fissura migera, e abscindeys am aquel totz les vaysels que descendo del cap als huels.	Stop the ends of that sharp part and the flesh attached to it, stop the edges of it reaching the bone, and push that into the middle crack until it reaches the middle fissure, and remove all the vessels that descend from the head to the heels.
Mays que sia continuada la inscizio ad aquo appar de la codena, e aprop fay aquo en la fissura migana entro al autra fissura.	Make sure the incision is continuous up to where the bone appears, and place it in the middle crack into the other fissure.
E pus que corr del sanc quantitat engual, exprem les locs de las pessas del sanc congilat.	And as the blood coagulates, press on the places of the wounds with a compress.
E aprop pausa en quascuna fissura calgua de coto vielh, e pausa sobre aquels polvils enbegutz en vi e oli e vi agre, e vegas que no endevengua apostema caut.	And place a cloth soaked in hot oil and vinegar over every fissure, and press on the pus that has formed in them to prevent it from becoming an abscess.
E en le tertz dia deslia le liament e aministra gran enfusio de aygua cauda o tebeza, e aprop cura aquo am enguent bazilicon am oli rozat e autres entro que las plaguas sian sanadas.	On the third day remove the lint and administer a strong infusion of hot water or tea leaves, and care for it with basil oil, rose oil, and others until the sores are healed.
Capitol .v.	Chapter V.
De la cura de lagramas per catartz e als huels descendentz de las partidas dedintz del cap.	On the treatment of abscesses by cupping and on the heels that descend from within the head.
Quan ad alcu veno catartz agutz e continuantz, e vezes les huels del malaute extenuatz petitz, e ja le reguardament de lor es debelitat, e las palpebras ulceradas e de lor cazo les pels, e en le preon del cap es dolor aguda ledent e extrenutacio consequent, lahoras sapias per aquestz accidentz que las materias e catartz no veno sino de motas venas de las partidas dedintz procedent.	If an abscess occurs that is continuous and extends, and sometimes the heels of the patient are weakened and slightly extended, and their weakness, ulcerated eyelids and loss of hair, and in the front of the head there is acute pain with associated swelling, then you should know by these signs that the matter and abscess does not come from other vessels but rather from the veins of the brain.
E la milhor curacio en aquels es aquesta: que comandes al malaute que raza lo sieu front, e aprop inscideys en aquel una fissura al mieg loc del front, un petit per la latitut (e comensa am la fissura del templar senestre entro al dextre templar; e sia inscisio entro al os; e eslongua la tua ma dels lacertz del templas lesquals son maugutz deves la mastigacio), entro que sia le os descubert.	The best cure for these is this: command the patient to raise his forehead, and make a small incision in the middle of the forehead, beginning from the left temple to the right temple; the incision should extend into the bone; and remove your hand from the temples which are painful due to the massage), until the bone is exposed.
Exsicca tot le sanc am espongua o am drap secc e aprop repleys entre las doas labias de la fissura am coto vielh o am draps de li.	Excise all the blood with sponge or dry cloth and place a compress or dry cloth between the two lips of the incision with gauze or dry cloth.
E aprop estrenh desus am polvils enbegutz en vi e oli per so que no endevengua apostema caut.	And press on it with pus that has formed in vinegar and oil to prevent it from becoming an abscess.
E quan deslias aquo e veses que l’apostema ja es diminuit, lahoras cove que fregua le os entro que comensa en lu nayser carn, e aprop cura aquel am regiment exsiccatiu le qual fassa neysser la carn, ayssi cum si tu prenes de farina de froment dos partidas e de colofania quatre partidas e mescla o, e de lor sia fayt emplastre e sia aministrat en aquestas plaguas a de la carn nativitat.	And when you remove it and see that the abscess has diminished, then it is necessary to cut the bone starting from where the flesh does not heal, and care for it with a drying regimen, which will make the flesh dry, such as if you take two parts of flour and four parts of gum Arabic and mix them together, and make a plaster out of it and apply it to those sores around the native flesh.
Capitol .vi.	Chapter VI.
De la cura de aquo que catz en las aurelhas.	On the treatment of abscesses in the ears.
Tota causa que catz en las aurelhas es una de quatre specias, quar o es peyra mineral o causa semblant a peyra, ayssi cum ferr e veyre, o es de planta ayssi cum ceze o fava, o es causa fluxtibla ayssi cum aygua e vi agre e a lor semblantz, o alcuna bestia.	The cause of an abscess in the ears is one of four types: it is either a mineral stone or something resembling a stone like iron and glass, or it is from plants like cherry or bean, or it is something fluid like water and vinegar and similar things, or some animal.
E donc quan peyra catz en l’aurelha o autra causa semblant de aquelas causas que no ajustan ne creysso en l’aurelha, e pausa la aurelha al solelh, e si vezes la peyra, lahoras distilla en aquela alcuna causa de oli violat o sizami, e aprop aministra la extraccio de lu, e fay le stornudar am condizi, e oppila las nars deve le aveniment de stornutacio.	Therefore when stone or something similar to those causes that are not suitable for the ear is present and the ear is stopped up, and sometimes the stone can be seen, then distill some volatile oil such as oil of violet or camphor in it, and administer the extraction, and cause the nose to sneeze, and open the nostrils so that the nasal discharge occurs.
E aprop pausa en le circuit de la aurelha alscunas pessas de drap o lana, e dextendas la aurelha a las partidas desus, quar motas veguadas es foro-getada am aquestas causas.	And place some pieces of cloth or wool around the ear and stretch the ear apart at the top, as these things are often forgotten with these causes.
E si no n’es getada, lahoras aministra extraccio de lu am le instrument apelat gesti epicicarios subtil del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if it is not forgotten, administer the extraction with the instrument called the epi-ciliary speculum, which has the following form:
E si es foro-getada am gesti, bo es; e sino, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am onci subtil de pauca duplicacio.	And if the epi-ciliary speculum is forgotten, it's okay; and if not, administer the extraction with a very thin hook with minimal duplication.
E donc si no es foro-getada per aquo, lahoras fay una canula de aram e entromet la extremitat de la canula en le trauc de la aurelha e claus a l’enviro de la canula am cera e am oli mollificada per so que no sia ubert sino la canula.	Therefore if it is not forgotten, make a cannula of metal and insert the tip of the cannula into the hole of the ear and close the end of the cannula with wax and softened oil so that it is not too tight but only the cannula.
E aprop extratz am le tieu vent am fort atraccio, quar tropas veguadas cum aquo que havem recontat.	Approach carefully extract the intestine with strong attraction, for many have previously observed this.
Mays si no es foro-getada en aquesta manieyra, lahoras pren de halka alumbat o de vecz aparelhat am le qual son preses les ausels una patita quantitat, e pausa aquel en la extremitat de ray, e aprop envolopa sobre aquel coto decentment pausat.	If not forgotten in this manner, then take alum or vinegar and attach a small amount of it to the bird's leg, and pause it at the end of the ray, and cover that area properly with a bandage.
E aprop entromet aquel en le trauc de la aurelha am facilitat, e aprop excicca la aurelha de la humiditat.	Approach the area under the nail with ease, and then carefully cut the nail from moisture.
E donc si no es foro-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recontadas, lahoras tu coyta a talhar aquela denant que endevengua apostema caut o espasme.	And so, if all the causes previously observed are not forgotten, then you cut that area to provoke abscess or spasm.
E la manieyra de talhar aquela es que tu al comensament sancnes le malaute de la vena sephasica e extratz del sanc segon la mannieyra de la vertut de lu, e aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas e converteys l’aurelha a las partidas desus, e fen am petita fissura en la razit de la aurelha deves lo greys de lu en le loc be premegut de lu.	The method of cutting that area is that you first lance the patient's saphenous vein and extract the blood according to its nature, then place the cork between your fingers and turn the nail towards the cuticle, making a small crack in the edge of the nail where the germs are located in the most appropriate place.
E sia la fissura de figura lunar entro que pervengua a la peyra, e, la peyra atrobada, osta aquela si podes am instrumentz apropriatz; e aprop cos la fissura en aquela hora am velocitat, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	The crack should be of a lunar shape leading to the stone, and, when the stone is drawn out, remove it if you can with appropriate instruments; and sew up the crack at that time with speed, and care for it until it heals.
E si la causa cazent en la aurelha es un dels gras que creysso e so inflatz, lahoras aministra la curacio e la extraccio de lu; mays si no obezeys a tu ad eyssiment, lahoras tu pren spatum teune subtil segon aquesta forma:	If the cause of the nail problem is one of the growths that has inflated, then administer the cure and its removal; but if you are not careful, then take thin spittle in this way:
e aministra am aquel la abscizio de aquel gra lo qual es cazut en l’aurelha.	and apply to that area the abscess of the growth that has arisen in the nail.
E no fassas aquo quan cogitas que aquel ja es humectat per la vapor del aurelha, e pausa aquel en motas pessas, e prop extratz ne aquelas am les oncis o am gesti subtil, o ab inscizio ayssi co dit havem, quar es alleujada la extraccio de lu.	Do not do this when you think that it is already damp from the nail steam, and pause it with many cushions, and carefully remove it from those places with scissors or delicate gestures, or by abscess as previously mentioned, because the removal of it is relieved.
Mays en l’aygua la qual es intrada en l’aurelha cove que·l malaute use de sternutacio am condizi al comensament, e omple la sieua aurelha am alcu coto vielh, e jagua sobre aquela aurelha en la qual es l’aygua, e si per aquo es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, lahoras pren tropas peyras teunas e leons segon la longitut del dit, e calfa aquelas en le foc un pauc, e le pacient entrometa una de aquelas en le trauc de la sua aurelha e saute sobre la un pe sieu de aquela partida e percussia am una autra peyra sobre la peyra la qual es dintz la aurelha.	But in the water that enters the nail, it is necessary for the patient to perform sneezing at the beginning, and fill their nail with an appropriate old substance, and massage over the nail where the water is located, and if this is forgotten, good; otherwise, take many thin pebbles and lemons according to the length of the finger, heat them in the fire for a short time, and let the patient insert one of those into the hole in their nail and jump on the other foot from that side and strike another pebble on the pebble that is under the nail.
Donc no cesse aquo am peyra entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada.	Therefore, do not stop this with a pebble until all the water is forgotten.
E ja l’aygua sira foro-getada enayssi que tu prenguas de papier o de gonc .i., e met la una extremetat de lu en l’aurelha e estendas l’autre extremitat am foc entro que sia comburit le may de lu.	And the water will be forgotten in such a way that you take paper or cloth, And place one end of it in the nail and extend the other end towards the fire until the pebble is burned at its base.
E prop met i autre gonc e fay aquo tantas veguadas entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada, e stratz aquel am canula ayssi co desus es dit de la peyra extrasadora.	And place another cloth and do this many times until all the water is forgotten, and strain it with a tube as previously mentioned of the stone remover.
Mays en la extraccio de bestia intrant en aquela aurelha, si es a petit cos, ayssi piussa e a lu semblant, cura aquel ayssi cum havem dit en la divisio; mays si es de gran cos la qual causa apar al sen del vezement, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am gesti e oncis, e la causa de lu es pus leugiera de totas las autras causas que cazo en l’aurelha.	But in the removal of animal matter that enters the nail, if it is small, do this more carefully and similarly, treat it as previously mentioned in the division; but if it is large and causes swelling at the root of the toe, administer its removal with gestures and scissors, and the cause of it is easier than all other causes that occur in the nail.
Mays en la extraccio de verm engendrat en la aurelha, quan tu curas aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e en le tractat de distillacios e no comfereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que tu reguardes la aurelha al solelh.	But in the removal of worms born in the nail, when you treat it as previously mentioned and do not confirm your cure, you must look at the nail on the sun.
E donc si apar aqui alcuna causa dels verms, lahoras extratz aquel am gesti o am onci subtils, mays si no apar deguna causa, lahoras pren una canula dejos streyta e desus ampla de la qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And so, if any cause of the worms appears, remove it with gestures or delicate scissors, but if no cause appears, take a tube that is narrow at the bottom and wide at the top in this way:
E entromet la extremitat subtil en la aurelha segon la quantitat la qual suffertar puesca le malaute; e aprop sucgeys am aquela per succio fort, e fay aquo motas veguadas, entro que totz les verms sian foro-gitatz.	Insert the narrow end of the tube into the nail according to the amount that the patient can bear; and cover it with a suction pump strongly, and do this many times until all the worms are forgotten.
Mays si no obezeysso a tu al ayssiment, lahoras tu opila e claus en le circuit de la canula am cera ayssi cum havem dit; lahoras aministre distillacios las quals han ja esproadas les antics en la curacio dels verms, e atrobaras aquo en le tractat de distillacios.	But if you are not careful, then plug and seal the circuit of the tube with wax as previously mentioned; administer distillations that have been tried by the ancients in the treatment of worms, and keep this in the treatment of distillations.
E sia la tua efusio am la qual efundas les olis medicinas en la aurelha am aquest strument del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	Your effusion that you pour the medicinal oils into the nail with this instrument, whose shape is as follows:
E fay aquela de argent o de eram, dejos streyt, en le qual sia un petit trauc, e am pla desus.	Make a silver or bronze cup, close it, inside which there should be a small hole, and flat on top.
E donc sia cum empellent a que es en la conquavitat de la canula de continent aqui on sira necessari.	And it shall be as they push for the cavity of the catheter to be in the concavity here where it will be necessary.
E si vols, pren le ray e envolveys en la extremitat de lu decentment coto, e aprop gieta oli en la concavitat del auziment, o suc de alcuna herba, o aquo que vols de aquestas medicinas en la canula — e aquela es en la aurelha —, e aprop entromet le ray am coto desus e exprem am la tua ma aquel am compressio temprada de lu entro que l’oli sia expellit en la concavitat del auziment e le malaute senta le oli dedintz.	If you wish, take the rod and wrap it in the proper part of it, and apply oil in the concavity of the sore, or juice from some herb, or any medicine of your choice into the catheter - it is in the ear - and press the rod with the proper part and squeeze with your hand to compress it temporarily inside until the oil is expelled in the concavity of the sore and the patient feels the oil inside.
E aquo que sia enfundut en la aurelha sia ja scalfat am foc un petit.	And whatever is stuffed into the ear should be heated slightly with fire.
E guarda te que la causa la qual distillaras en l’aurelha no sia trop frega, quar las medicinas de aurelha no suffertan aquo.	Be careful that the substance you will distill in the ear is not too hot, for medicines of the ear cannot withstand water.
Capitol .vii.	Capital VII.
De curacio de opilacio de aurelhas.	On the cure of ear blockages.
Alcunas veguadas alcus enfantz yeysso dels ventres de lors mayres no-perforatz, e aquo ja accideys en alcus homes, opilacio en le meat de la aurelha per plagua o per carn nada en aquela; e aquesta opilacio alcunas veguadas es fayta en le preon del trau de la aurelha la qual no consiec le vezement, e alcunas veguadas es en las partidas defora.	Sometimes children are born without perforated ventricles from their mothers, and this condition occurs in some men, blockage in the tissue of the ear due to inflammation or non-healing flesh; and this blockage sometimes occurs at the entrance of the ear canal which does not drain, and sometimes it occurs in the outer parts.
E aquela que accideys en le preon de lu, la qual no comprehen le vezement, es en las majors disposicios de dificil sanacio.	That which happens at the front of it (the body part), which is not understood by the patient, is in the greatest dispositions for difficult healing.
E en aquela en qual consegueys le vezement, cove que tu pauses la aurelha del malaute al solelh e reguarda en aquela.	In that which you understand by the patient's explanation, it is necessary that you cover the patient's ear to the ground and look at it (the affected area).
E donc si vezes oppulacio apparent, obre aquela am espatum subtil del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if there is an obvious distention, open that with a thin spatula, which is its form.
Si’ la extremitat de lu en la qual sia petita la latitut, del qual la una partida sia aguda e l’autra no; e le spatum sia de dos latz leon per so que no fassa lizio al aurelha.	If the extremity of it (the body part) is small in width, and one side is sharp while the other is not; and the spatula should be of two lion's lengths long to avoid injuring the ear.
E donc si la opilacio es per carn nascuda en la aurelha o en le meat de lu, lahoras te aquela am oncis subtils e incidiys aquela vehement facilitat entro que sia ostada tota la carn.	And if the obstruction is due to flesh growing in the ear or the meat of it (the body part), you should remove it with a sharp and pointed tool, and cut it off quickly before all the flesh has been removed.
E si opilacio es en le preon de la aurelha, lahoras pren ray subtil leon e escalfa aquel am foc un pauc, e aprop met aquel en le meat de l’aurelha.	And if the obstruction is in the front of the ear, you should take a thin wire that has been heated slightly with fire and place it in the flesh of the ear.
E donc si as scentit oppulacio am aquo que le malaute atroba am facilitat, per gravetat de ausir, esforsa la oppressio de lu am facilitat; e guarda te que no plagues les nervis del aurelha.	And if the patient feels obvious obstruction with difficulty breathing, you should try to relieve the obstruction gently without causing harm to the nerves of the ear.
E aprop pausa en l’aurelha drap de li segon la quantitat del ample del trauc lo qual tu as envolvutz en l’enguent egipciac; e fay aquo per alcus jorns entro que sias segur de la consolidacio de la plagua; o que prenguas qualgua e enfon aquela en ayguaros e pulveriza sobre lu segi trissat e usa de lu; e si vezes la aurelha ja esser apostemada, lahoras cove que tu estraguas la qualgua e permutes aquela am autra qualgua la qual tu envoloparas en cerot que sia fayt am oli rozat, entro que sia le apostema caut cedat; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then cover the ear with cloth of the appropriate size, wrapping it with the Egyptian ointment that you have applied; and do this for several days until you are sure of the healing of the wound or take some other medication and immerse it in water, then crush it into powder and use it according to the instructions; and if the ear is already suppurating, you must remove the pus and replace it with another medicine that you have wrapped in a cotton soaked in rose oil until the suppuration subsides; and care for it until it is healed.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras submergeys esponga o drap en aygua frega e pausa sobre la aurelha, e usa del autra curacio la qual restrengeys le flux del sanc, la qual es dita en le tractat de distillacio.	If there is bleeding from the ear, immerse a sponge or cloth in hot water and place it on the ear, and use another treatment to stop the bleeding, which is called "distillation" in the medical treatise.
Capitol .viii.	Kapitel VIII. (Kapitel means chapter)
De cura de athezil le qual endeveno a las palpebras.	Vom Behandeln von Augenathese, die sich zu den Augen erstrecken. (Endeveno means to extend towards)
Athezil les quals endeveno a las paupebras dels huels alcuna veguada so humitz, alscunas veguadas son secs.	Augenathese, die sich zu den Augen erstrecken und manchmal feucht sind, sind bei einigen Personen trocken. (Endeveno means to extend towards)
Donc cove que tu tenguas aquels am tenhalhas o am onci, e inscindas aquels am espatum de las suas razitz, e aprop pausa sobre les locs segi trissat.	Deshalb muss man die Augenathese mit der Hand oder mit einem Instrument, das zum Zerteilen geeignet ist, entfernen und auf den verletzten Stellen eine Pulvermischung anwenden.
Mays si dolor am flux de sanc veno, lahoras tu cauteriza aquels am cauteri lanticular subtil.	Wenn es Schmerzen mit Blutfluss gibt, sollten Sie diese mit einer kleinen glühenden Nadel behandeln.
E la milhor cauterizacio es aprop las inscizios e tropas veguadas retornam quan reman alcuna causa de sas razitz; e quan so cauterizadas am foc, aquelas razitz son comburidas e no retornan.	Die beste Behandlung ist die Entfernung der Schwellungen und trockenen Verletzungen, wenn es noch eine Ursache für die Entstehung ist; und wenn sie mit dem Feuer behandelt werden, verbrennen diese Verletzungen und kehren nicht zurück.
Capitol .ix.	Kapitel IX. (Kapitel means chapter)
Cura de grandeyssa que veno a las palpebras dels huels.	Behandlung von großen Augenkrankheiten, die sich zu den Augen erstrecken.
Motas veguadas endeve en las palpebras dels huels alcuna causa la qual es asemblada a grandissa en sa fortalicia e duricia, e per so grandissia es apelada.	Beim Auftreten von Tumoren in den Augen gibt es eine Ursache, die ähnlich einer großen Krankheit ist und wegen ihrer Größe und Härte auch als solche bezeichnet wird.
E es agreguacio de humiditat grossa en la palpebra dejos e desus.	Es handelt sich um eine Ansammlung von großer Feuchtigkeit in der Augenlidunter- und -oberseite.
Donc la opperacio en lor es que consideras lahoras si la grandissia es procedent en lu en aquo que apar de la palpebra e es mauguda a tota partida; e la causa de lu es leugiera.	Deshalb untersucht man, ob die Größe der Tumoren durch etwas hervorgerufen wird, das aus dem Auge kommt und überall verbreitet ist; und die Ursache dieses Vorgangs ist unauffällig.
Donc fen sobre aquela am fissura per la latitut, e aprop escorga aquela de tota partida am facilitat entro que evasesca, e aprop suspen aquela am onci e abscindeys aquela.	Es sei denn, fürechte die Tumoren durch eine Aussparung in der Länge und entfernt sie mit Mitteln zur Entfernung oder Abschneiden.
Mays si a tu no es apparelhada la incizio de lu si no pus que penetras la palpebra am inscizio pauc a pauc, lahoras aquo no notz en deguna causa.	If you are not prepared for the incision, and you cannot pierce the eyelid with a small cut, then you will not notice anything in any case.
E si la figura es gran, lahoras tu l’ajusta am sutura; e cura aquela entro que sia sanada.	If the wound is large, then adjust it with stitches, and take care of it until it heals.
E si es pauca, a tu no sobrevindra mal per aquela quar l’anguent de lu restaura aquela e encarna.	If it is small, you will not suffer harm by allowing the anguent (?) to restore and heal it.
E si la grandissia es declinant a las partidas dedintz de la palpebra deves la superficia dedintz, lahoras evesa la palpebra e suspen la grandissia am onci, otra que tu indigescas de incizio, e prem aquela de tota part, e si la palpebra per inscizio es alonguada, aquo no notz en deguna causa.	If the swelling is spreading towards the inner parts of the eyelid, you should remove the surface of the eyelid and suspend the swelling with a hook, one that you require for incision, and press it all around, and if the eyelid is elongated by incision, you will not notice anything in any case.
E aprop la incizio, lava le huel am aygua salada; e cura le loc am aquo que encarna entro que sia sanat.	Clean the wound with salt water, and treat the area with something that heals it until it is healed.
Capitol .x.	Chapter X.
De la cura axcirnah en la palpebra desus del huel.	On the treatment of inflammation in the eyelid above the wound.
Axcirnath es grays le qual es engendrat en las tunicas de la palpebra desus, e majorment endeve als enfantz, agrava les huels de aquels et accideyso a lor catartz le mayti; e no podon reguardar la claror del solelh per aquo quar lagremas se coytan ad aquels.	Inflammation of the eyelid above the wound is grayish in color and is most often found in children, aggravating their wounds and causing their catarrhs to worsen; and they cannot look at the sun due to the tearing of tears at it.
E per so tu vezes aquels jaser sobre les lors caras tot temps, e sobre les lors caras dormen; e so a las palpebras de lor dejos les sobrecils humidas, las quals ja ha cuberta imflacio, e iminencia de accernac apparent es en l’uelh; e que quant tu premes le loc am les tieus ditz, tu centes accernac entro aquels.	And they often lie on their faces all the time and sleep on their faces; and when their eyelids are wet from below the eyebrows, which have already been covered by inflammation, it appears imminent that infection will occur in the eye; and when you press the area with your fingers, you will feel the infection inside.
E alcuna manieyra de opperacio es en aquel que le malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop pausa drap de li e de lu fay calgua, e fay de lu cercle segon la quantitat la qual contena arthernach de tota partida, e aprop pausa aquel sobre aquela e prem am les tieus ditz de tota per que sia agreguat arcernac en le mieg del cercle, e aprop fen en le mieg de aquela humiditat am spatum inscident am fissura per la latitut, e la fissura no sia major que la fissura que es fayta en flaubotomia.	One method of operation is when the patient lowers their head into your lap, and you place a cloth over them and apply warm water to it in a circle corresponding to the size of the inflammation, and place that over the inflammation and press with your fingers all around to aggravate infection in the middle of the circle. Then make an opening in the middle of the inflammation with a lancet, making sure that the incision is not larger than the incision made during lancing (lymphotomy).
Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.	But in the preparation (of the treatment), it is necessary that you cut open the scrotum entirely until you reach the infection, since in the most favorable cases, the infection may be treated by incision in the form of white pus-like substance.
Donc extratz aquela am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.	Then extract it with cloths that you have wrapped between your fingers and turn it with your right and left hands until it is discharged.
E guarda te que no ajustes en la fissura per so que am le spatum no pervenguas al huel e ladescas aquel.	And be careful not to adjust the incision so that with the pus you do not reach the eye and damage it.
Mays si no apar a tu arternach en le comensament de la fissura, mays que tu ajustes en la fissura un petit am fecilitat entro que procesisca arternach; e aprop extratz aquela ayssi quo havem dit; e aprop submargeys draps de li en aygua e vi agre e pausa les sobre le loc e estrenh aquels am polvils.	But if the pus does not appear at the beginning of the incision, you should adjust the incision slightly to facilitate the release of the pus; and then extract it as described earlier; and immerse cloths in warm water and wring them out and place them on the area and press them with sand or something similar.
E so alcus que trissan sal e pausan aquel en la conquavitat de la fissura per so que aquo que es remas de aquela humiditat.	And let those who have salt and powder it in the hollow of the incision to absorb that remaining moisture.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And take care of it until it is healed.
Mays si accideys en le loc apostema caut, lahoras cura aquel am emplastres cedatils entro que sia sanat.	But if an abscess occurs in the cauterized spot, you should take care of it with ointments made from castor oil until it is healed.
Capitol .xi.	Chapter XI.
De manieyras de tactimi del huel.	On methods for touching the wound.
Quan en las palpebras dels huels so natz pels ajustatz dejos les pels naturals e so antiquatz, lahoras aquels noso al huel e fan endevenir manieras de malautias ayssi cum lacrimas assiduas e mollificacio de palpebras e tela entro que aquo sia causa de destruccio del huel que s’apela tactinir del huel, e cura se en quatre manieyras: o per cauteri am foc; o am medicina acuta segon que denant es dit en le capitol de cauteri; o es fayt atactini per inscizio e sutura; o per cannas segon que yeu diyre.	When ulcers on the eyelids are caused by natural hairs and are chronic, you should press the eye with your fingers and make efforts to find ways to alleviate the pain, such as frequent tearing and softening of the eyelid, which is known as touching the wound. Treatment can be done in four ways: either by cauterizing with fire; or with acute medicine as described in the section on cauterization; or by touching through incision and suturing; or by using tubes as I will explain later.
E donc cove que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se; aprop converteys la palpebra del uelh am la tua ma sinistra, e si es convertida, bo es; e sino, entromet agulha en aquela en la qual sia fiel de la partida pus dejos de la palpebra, e fay penetrar la agulha am fiel desus, e aquo sia — prop del marge de la palpebra en le qual naysso les pels — prop dels pels, e tira le fiel a las partidas desus am la palpebra, e converteys aquela am le ray.	And therefore you should lay the patient's head in your lap; turn the eyelid of the affected eye towards your left hand, and if it is turned, that is good; otherwise, insert a needle into the area where the hairs are closest to the underside of the eyelid, and make the needle penetrate through the eyelid, and it should be near the edge of the eyelid where the hairs are located; pull the needle out towards the upper part of the eyelid with your right hand, and turn the eyelid away from the eye.
E aprop fen en la partida dedintz de la palpebra dejos les pels ajustatz am spatum inscidentz del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal mendre; e aprop extratz le fiel e pausa dejos la palpebra polvilhs petitz de coto o de drap, e aprop senha sobre la palpebra am tenta, e sia ayssi cum figura de fuelha de mirt.	Then make an opening in the underside of the eyelid near the hairs that are closest to the upper part of the eyelid, and insert a lancet into the lacrimal duct from the larger lacrimal duct towards the smaller one; and extract the needle and place small pieces of sand or cloth under the eyelid, and then apply pressure on the eyelid with tweezers in the shape of a myrtle leaf.
Mays empero cove que sia la figura segon la quantitat de helevacio de la palpebra, quar aquo ja es diversificat en les homes, quar de aquels es le quals indigeys que sia inscidit de la palpebra gran quantitat segon la quantitat per la qual la palpebra es mollificada.	However, it is important that the shape should correspond to the degree of swelling of the eyelid, since this has been diversified among men, for those who require a large incision in the eyelid according to the degree by which the eyelid is softened.
E aprop fen am le spatum sobre las doas linhas las quals has senhadas, e comensa del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal menor.	Then make an incision along the two lines that you have marked, and start from the greater lacrimal to the lesser lacrimal.
E si’ la tua fissura prop dels pels naturals ayssi cum es la grossetut del rey.	And if your fissure is next to the natural hairs as the thickness of a coin.
E aprop met le onci en un dels dos angles de la codena, e aprop excoria aquela tota, e aprop ajusta am la scitura las doas labias am gula o fiel de lana subtil, e abstergeys le sanc, e fay adherir aquo que superflueys dels fiels sobre dos sobrecils am alcunas causas enviscans, si voles far aquo, e sino, non cures.	Here is the translation: And place the coin in one of the two angles of the incision, and excise that entire area, and adjust the two labias (lips) with a fine thread or woolen yarn, cleanse the blood, and adhere any superfluous hairs over the eyebrows with certain adhesive substances if you want to do this, but do not bother if you don't.
E aprop leyssa la sutura dels fiels entro a tres dias o quatre, e aprop cura aquo.	Here is the translation: And let the suture of the hairs remain for three to four days and take care of it.
E si vols, layssa la plagua ses sutura, e cura aquela am aquo que exsicca e constrenh, quar la palpebra es alevada deves la sigillacio de la plagua e la agreguacio de lu; mays sutura es milor E donc aysso diysso les antics de taxanir.	Here is the translation: And if you wish, leave the wound unsutured, and care for it with something that dries and constricts, since the eyelid recovers quickly from the sealing of the wound and its adhesion; but suturing is better, and therefore the ancients used this method more often.
Mays empero en lu sia sollicitut sobre le malaute, e es de bona operacio, e no es en lu temor.	Here is the translation: However, it should only be sought when the patient requires it, and it is a good action, and there is no reason to fear it.
E es autra manieyra en taxmir, e es que senhes sobre la palpebra figura ayssi cum fuelha de mirt, e aprop eleva la palpebra am tres uncis segreguatz e congreguatz segon aquesta forma:	Here is the translation: And another method of treatment is to draw the figure of myrtle leaf on the eyelid, and then lift the eyelid with three separate and connected incisions as follows:
Mays si no es possible aquo, tener les uncis, e aquo no es engualhat, lahoras pren una agula en la qual haia fil e met aquela en le mieg de la figura, e entromet le autre fiel prop le lacrimal major, e·l fiel segon prop le lacrimal mendre, e ajusta entre les tieus ditz les fiels am equalitat, e aprop am aquels eleva la tua ma am elevacio engual, eleva tota la codena sobre la qual es senhat ayssi cum havem recomtat.	Here is the translation: But if this method cannot be performed, then hold the incisions, and ensure that it is not sutured. Then take a needle with thread and put it in the middle of the figure, and insert another needle next to the greater lacrimal, and the third needle next to the lesser lacrimal, adjusting them equally between the incisions. Lift your hand with the same elevation as the incision on the area marked as described earlier.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Here is the translation: And adjust the two lips of the wound with sutures and care for it until it heals.
Mays si accideys apostema deves la tua inscizio o la tua fissura, seda aquel apostema am cerot e a lu semblantz, e am enguentz.	Here is the translation: But if an abscess occurs at your incision or fissure, remove it with a lancet and similar instruments, and wash it with warm water.
E alcunas veguadas endeve a la palpebra que·ls sieus pels sian convertitz, adonc cove que tu uses en aquela de aquo que havem dit de inscizio; mays sutura en quascus es mays artificial.	Here is the translation: Sometimes hairs grow into the eyelid, and then you should use what has been described for incision; but suturing is more artificial in such cases.
Ataxinir am cannas es segon aquesta forma:	The method of cauterization with reed is as follows:
e es que tu convertas la palpebra e scindas la figura qu’es dedintz segon que he recontat; e aprop per art fay doas cannas o doas astelas subtils de las quals longitut sia segon la longitut de la palpebra e la latitut de lor sia mendra de la latitut del spatum.	Here is the translation: And you convert the eyelid and divide the figure inside as described before; and carefully make two thin reeds or twigs, whose length should be equal to the length of the eyelid, and the width of their ends should be slightly smaller than the width of the spatula.
E tu ja has inscidit en las extremitatz de quascunas partidas, la on tenes les fils.	Here is the translation: And you have already made an incision at the ends of each partition where the threads are located.
Aprop agregua quascuna am subtilitat subre aquo que superflueys de la palpebra del huel, e constres las cannas de quascunas partidas am fort strictura, e layssa aquela per alcus jorns, quar la codena per la strictura morira e sira denegada e se poyrira entro que per si meteyssa cayra.	Here is the translation: Apply each part with fine substances under what is superfluous of the eyelid of the eye, and tighten the reeds of each partition with strong compression, and leave it for several days, since the wound will dry up and die and eventually fall out.
Mays si es tardat, lahoras trenca la am las toroyras, e aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanat.	Here is the translation: But if it takes too long, break the thread and care for the wound until it heals.
Donc cum es solidada, la palpebra es elevada e les pels no pungo.	When the eyelid has been treated, it rises and the hairs do not pierce through.
E aquesta es la forma de doas cannas las quals faras segon aquesta forma:	This is the way to make two reeds as follows:
e haia la quantitat de la longitut e de la latitut ni mays ni mens.	And have the length and width neither more nor less.
Capitol .xii.	Title XII.
De elevacio de pels pungentz en le huel am agula quan le pel es dur.	On removing hairs that pierce the eye with an awl when the hair is hard.
Quan son pels no-naturals, durs e aspres e pungentz les huels, lahoras la operacio en lu es que tu prenguas agula subtil e pauses en aquela fiel de ceda subtil e leon, e aprop que tu ajustes las extremitatz de lu e nozes quascu en manieyra mot subtil.	When the hairs are not natural, hard, rough and piercing the eyes, you should perform the operation by taking a sharp awl, placing it on a soft and supple needle, and ensuring that the ends of the tool are adjusted carefully without any subtle movement.
E sia la longitut dels fiels de quantitat de una palma.	The length of the hairs should be as long as one hand span.
E aprop tu compon2 autre fiel subtil dejos lu en breu, e nuza las extremitatz de aquel si tu·t vols.	You should make another thin needle near it in short order, and cut the ends of that one if you want to do so.
E aprop pause le malaute le sieu cap en le tieu se, e sia prop del solelh per que la tua obra sia declarada, quar es operacio subtil e menuda.	Place the patient's head in your lap and position it facing you so that your work is visible, since this operation is delicate and requires precision.
E aprop intromet la agulha en la razit del pel ajustat la qual ha necessitat de engen, e fay aquela penetrar en la palpebra festinantment entro que extraguas aquela desus le pel natural.	Approach the needle into the incision of the skin carefully adjusted that requires suturing, and make it penetrate quickly into the eyelid before drawing it out through the skin naturally.
E aprop tire le pel entro desus e intromet aquel en alixati, e sian les pels un o dos o tres e no mays.	Then pull the hair up and insert the thread into it (or them), and ensure that there are one or two or three but not more.
E aprop tira la tua ma am aquel entro que·l pel sia fora-gitat am alixolati en la palpebra am le pel natural.	Then tie your hand around it where the hair has been pulled out, inserting the thread into the eyelid and pulling it through naturally.
Mays si es atirat alixalati e non es gitat le pel, atiraras alixati a las partidas dejos am le fiel le qual tu has compost am aquela, entro qu’en sia gitat alixalati del trau sobira.	If the stitching is not done and the hair has not been pulled out, you should insert the thread at the sides of the wound that you have made and tied with the same thread, until it emerges through the skin above the wound.
E vegas aquela am la visio del huel, quar lahoras tu gitaras alixati e lo fiel, e grotan quascu e clautz le huel, e laysse le claus per dos dias o tres, entro que·l pel adheresca al sieu loc e nasque sobre aquel bona carn.	And wait for the wound to heal, because when you have inserted and tied the stitching, you should press on the swelling and clamp it with forceps, leaving them in place for two or three days until the hair adheres to its location and grows over it well.
E si es mays breu le pel, lahoras tu ajusta un pel lonc dels pels naturals, e es elevat am aquel, o que·l leysses entro que sia alonguat aprop alcu spazi, e lehoras tu eleva aquel.	If the hair is too short, then you should take a longer natural hair and tie it to the one that has been pulled out, lifting it up or letting it grow until it reaches an appropriate space, and continue lifting it upwards.
Capitol .xiii.	Chapter XIII.
De la cura de ehacratir la qual ve en la palpebra desus.	On the treatment of echydris that occurs in the upper eyelid.
Quan ve en le huel ehacratir, e es contraccio de la palpebra quan es contrayta en sus, o a dextra o a sinistra partida, per mala consolidacio de plagua o de seccio o de cauteri, e es apelada leporina, e aquesta ahercrati o es natural o accidental, e es fayta per consolidacio de plagua o de seccios o de cauteri, o per semblantz a lor malcuratz.	When an echydris (sty) appears in the eyelid and is caused by contraction of the eyelid when it is pulled to one side due to poor healing from a wound or burn, it is called leprosy, and this type of echydris can be either natural or accidental, caused by poor healing from a wound or burn, or resembling them in appearance.
May la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que tu fendas aquela consolidacio e que separes las labias de lu, e pauses en lu en aquo que es entre aquelas una meca de drap de li, e ligues aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	The method of operation is to make an incision in the consolidation and separate the lips of it, and place a piece of linen cloth between them, and tie them together until they are healed.
E no cove que tu uses de curacio de lu de las causas las quals exsiccan, constrenho; quar si tu fas aquo retorna alixacratir pus mal que nulh temps no foc habantz.	It is necessary to treat the cause of the echydris that causes it to recur, since if you do not do so, the echydris will return even worse than before.
Usa en aquela de causas que mollifico ayssi cum es fenugrec, e embroca am la aygua en la qual son coytz altea e semensa de li, o enguent dyaquilon, le qual sia liquefayt am alcu dels olis, e submergeys en aquel la meca, e cura am aquel.	Use remedies that soften the cause, such as fenugreek, and wrap it in water in which it has been boiled with its seeds, or gum tragacanth, which should be liquefied with one of the oils, and immerse the cloth in it and treat with it.
E lo tesaur de la tua curacio es que tu perforsses am tot engen que no sia consolidat segon la forma que foc al comensament.	The secret to your treatment is to perform all procedures without causing any further consolidation according to the original form.
E aquesta operacio la qual havem dita, no es sino alcuna rectificacio de ehalixacrati que no retorna la forma del loc segon que foc denant.	This operation that we have described is not only a correction of echydris but also serves to restore the original shape of the affected area.
Capitol .xiiii.	Chapter XIV.
De la cura de ehacrati le qual es fayt en la palpebra dejos.	On the treatment of echydris that occurs in the lower eyelid.
Aquesta alxacrati la qual es fayta en la palpebra dejos, la qual es nompnada vertadierament alxacrati; e es de lu alcuna natural, autra accidental.	The echydris that occurs in the lower eyelid is called true echydris; it can be either natural or accidental.
Mays accidental es fayta per plagua o per scissura o per cauteri o per autres semblantz.	Accidental echydris is caused by a wound, burn, or other similar factors.
E la via de la operacio de lu es que tu prenguas una agula en la qual haga fil doble, e fiques aquela en la carn, e que la fassas passar del lacrimal de senestre entro al lacrimal dextre, entro que·l fil pervengua en las doas extremitatz de la carn.	The method of operation for this is to take a needle with double thread and insert it into the skin, making it pass from the tear duct on the left side to the tear duct on the right side until the thread reaches both ends of the skin.
E aprop exten la carn a las partidas desus am la agula e cus aquela am la agula, e inscideys am spatum ample.	Then stretch the skin to the sides with the needle and sew it up with the needle, making an incision with a large scalpel.
E donc si retorne la figura de la palpebre segon que cove, bo es; e sino, pren le ray e pausa aquel en la figura fenduda, e am aquel converteys la palpebra, e fen las doas fissuras en le latz de la palpebra dejos.	And if the eye shape returns as it should be, that is good; otherwise, take the ray and place it in the split figure, then turn the eyelid and make two openings on the sides of the eyelid from its hinge.
E sian las extremitatz de las doas fissuras de dos angles de la inscizio, la qual has fayta entro que concurren, e sia de lor fayt angle entro que quan se congreguan sia fayta figura de lor.	The extremities of the two fissures should be made at two angles of the incision, which you have already made up to where they converge, and the angle should be made such that when they come together, a figure is formed from them.
E aquesta figura es letra greca: la landa.	And this figure is the Greek letter lambda.
E aprop osta la carn aquela per la quantitat que es le latz de lu agut dejos de lu, aquo que siec la palpebra.	Then remove the flesh to the extent of the acute angle's width, ensuring that it is sufficient for the eyelid.
E aprop ajusta las partz seperadas e cos aquelas am le fil de lana; e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit de las medicinas mollificativas e de las calguas entro que sia sanat.	Then adjust the separated parts and sew them with cotton thread, and take care of them with the medicine for softening and blisters until they are healed.
E si alxacrati endeve per fissura o sutura o cauteri, lahoras cove que tu fendas am fissura plana sobre les pels de la palpebra segon que es precedit.	And if you are incising through a fissure or suture or cauterization, then you must open it with a flat incision on the skin of the eyelid as previously described.
E aprop separa am la calgua entre doas labias segon que havem dit.	Then separate the blister between the two lips as previously mentioned.
En la suma del sermo de la cura de alxacrati quan es desus o dejos, que corra en lu operacio, segon que es preparat de la forma de alxacrati, e aquela es en forma de motas diversitatz.	In the summary of the sermon on the treatment of incision, whether above or below, it runs in operation according to its preparation, and that shape is in the form of various motes.
E le artifexs savi totz temps prepara engen en quascuna manieyra la qual es possibla a lu entro que fassa retornar la figura a la forma natural, o prop de aquela, e aquel malaute segon que a lu conveneys de la operacio e dels strumentz en las majors disposicios.	And the skilled craftsman always prepares an instrument in every way that is possible for him to return the figure to its natural shape or as close as possible, and the patient according to what is necessary for the operation and tools in the best arrangement.
Capitol .xv.	Chapter XV.
De la adherencia de la palpebra am la conjunctiva o am la cornea.	On the adhesion of the eyelid with the conjunctiva or the cornea.
Quan accideys aquesta consolidacio a motz homes enayssi que sia solidada la palpebra pus desus am le album del huel, e sia prohibida de la facilitat del movement e de las suas obras naturals, donc cove que tu entrometas la extramitat del ray dejos la palpebra, e eleva en sus aquela, o exten aquela am le unci.	When this consolidation occurs in many men who have the eyelid adhered to the cornea or conjunctiva, and it is solidified above the lid and the albumen of the white, prohibiting the ease of movement and its natural functions, therefore you must go under the edge of the ray from below the eyelid and lift it upwards, or stretch it with oil.
E aprop tu inscideys la adherencia am spatum subtil, le qual no sia am acuitat de las inscisios, habantz obtus un petit per so que·l malaute no sia inquietat deves la operacio, e remau le spatum que no ledesca le huel am la sua acuitat.	Then you must incise the adhesion with a thin spatula that is not as sharp as an incision, having a blunt tip so that the patient is not disturbed by the operation, and remove the spatula without damaging the white with its point.
E sia la tua inscizio quays excorjan aquela adherencia am facilitat entro que sia retornada la palpebra segon la sua forma natural e que sia sanada tota la adherencia.	And your incision should be such that it separates the adhesion with ease until the eyelid returns to its natural shape and the entire adhesion is healed.
E aprop tu met en le huel aygua salada am la qual tu laves; o distilla en lu de zunia dissolvut en l’aygua.	Then put salt water on the white, with which you wash it; or distill in its place a solution of rosewater diluted in water.
E aprop separa entre la palpebra e l’huel am calgua de li, e pausa sobre le huel lana infuza en album de huou, e aprop le tertz jorn usa de causas consolidativas entro que sia sanat.	Then separate the eyelid and conjunctiva with blistering fluid, and place cotton wool soaked in albumen of egg white on the conjunctiva, and apply the third day causes for consolidation until it is healed.
Capitol .xvi.	Chapter XVI.
De inscizio de ungla e de eminencia de carn dels lacrimals.	When it comes to the incision of a nail and the removal of skin from the tear ducts, follow these steps:
Sapias que ungla es segon dos manieyras, quar o es nervosa, e es semblant a ciphac dur subtil; o es no-nervosa, semblant a humiditat blanca congilada, la qual quan ferr la toca, o es forsat aquela prendre am onci, es abscindida e le onci no es ficat en lu.	Know that the nail can be in two ways: either it is nerve-like and similar to hard, thin cartilage; or it is not-nerve like, similar to white, congealed moisture. When you touch it with an iron, if it is filled, it will break off and the iron will not be inserted into it.
E amdos las specias no comensan sino del lacrimal major entro que va petit a petit que cobre la vista e prohibeys le lum e·l movement de huel.	And in both cases, they do not start except from the larger tear duct and gradually cover the sight and block the light and movement of the white.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en la inscizio de lu es que·l malaute pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop obre les huels de lu, e eleva la palpebra am la tua ma, e aprop colligeys la ungla am onci de pauca duplicacio e exten aquela a las partidas desus.	The way of working in the incision is that the patient holds his head in your lap, opens his eyes wide, and lifts the eyelid with your hand, then collects the nail with an iron probe and extends it to the sides above.
E aprop pren una agula e entromet en aquela un pel de cavalh o de buou o de vaqua, o de semblantz, o de fiel fort, o duplica la extremitat de la agulha petit a petit e fica aquela en le mieg de la ungla, e penetra aquela am la agulha, e lia am fiel la ungla; e exten aquela a las partidas desus, e excorja am le pel le latz de la ungla lo qual siec la pupilla.	Approach a needle and insert it into the big toe of a horse or bull or cow, or similar, or strong hide, double the tip of the needle gradually and place it in the middle of the nail, and penetrate with the needle through the nail, and tie the skin to the nail; and then stretch it to the sides, remove the hide piece from the nail root which contains the pupil.
E ayssi tu sieguas aquela am le pel entro al derier de lu.	Following this, you continue with the skin into the back of it.
E aprop tu inscideys le romanent en la razitz del lacrimal am spatum subtil o am petitas forfexs, e leysa la carn del lacrimal natural per so que per inscizio de aquela no endevengua fluxs de lagremas continuabla.	Then you also incise the remaining skin at the root of the nose with a sharp blade or small scissors, and cut through the natural cartilage of the nose so that the incision does not cause continuous tears of tears.
E alscunas vetz la ungla am le sol onci estenduda o am fiel, ayssi co havem dit, e aprop sia excurjat am spatum leon del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	At times the nail with the sole extended or thickened, as has been said, and then it should be excised with a lion's tooth, which is the shape of it:
E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	Be careful not to touch the corneal tissue with the scalpel and to cause a rupture, and that the pupil is perforated.
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	Approach the incision at the heel with a little salt solution or vinegar made of cinnamon, let it enter for a day, and care for it with whatever is needed until it is healed.
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	If the nail is not nerve-like and you cannot insert the needle, or if it is embedded in the onyx, then this type of nail is cured with medicines, and healed in such a way as I have said and recommended in the division.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	If you want to incise it, then you open the heel of the patient and take a sharp blade in the form of a lion's tooth with full sharpness:
am subtilitat.	with sharpness.
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	And if it is narrowed and congested and you insert in that incision, then distill your oil made of cinnamon or cinnamon oil or salted water into the heel for a day and apply it to the heel daily.
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat the operation over it until everything that is of it has passed, unless the opposite abscess begins in the heel, then you remove that, and treat the abscess at first until it is healed.
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	Then repeat your operation over it with reason until it is healed.
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	The discharge of the nasal tissue, if it is noticeable in the heel with great harm, should be suspended by the nail; and incise that from one side, and do not deepen the incision so as not to cause continuous tears of tears.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	And apply cinnamon oil to the nasal cavity daily until it is healed.
Capitol .xvii.	Chapter XVII.
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	On the incision of gangrene and that which is born from tight skin on the heel.
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	Sometimes in the heels of elbows, red skin is born, and it is overpressed before covering the pupil, or near or protruding on the eyelids and strongly compress the eyelids at the sides outside and resembles a rose bush.
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	But the operation is that the patient places his head on your lap; and you open the heels of it and collect all that skin with the appropriate nails, using a forceps or a bandage; and then incise the skin from the beginning until it is finished with the scissors, and be careful not to cut the heel as you perform your operation.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	And your incision should be with the one you incise that or with the scalpel that we have recommended in the nail incision, or with small scissors with which you can cut according to the shape of it as this chapter will explain further.
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	Therefore, when your incision is complete and all that skin has been removed, fill the heel with salt water, or distill in it red powder like the corrosive medicines, and wait on the heel covered with hog's fat until the abscess is assured.
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	If there is still any cause of gangrene and the wound is infected with pus, and you fear an abscess, then remove the heel and treat that abscess with what cures it, and repeat over it with the operation until it is healed, and do the same with the tight skin that appears on the heels of this type.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.
