De la cura de hernia entestinal.	On the care of intestinal hernia.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The onset of this hernia is by a section that penetrates into the abdomen from the sides of the abdominal muscles due to which the intestines protrude through the rupture of one or more of the intestinal sacs.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	This rupture can be due to the cephalic or the external part of it, and such a thing can happen in two ways for various reasons: by blows, by falls, by shouts, by an elevation caused by some grave condition, or something similar.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	The sign of such (rupture), when it is due to the cephalic, is that it happens gradually over a long time, not suddenly, and it is an abscess formed around the hernia because the cephalic compresses the intestine.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	The sign of such (rupture), when it is due to the section of the cephalic, is that at the beginning it causes a strong sudden pain; and the abscess appears in various places other than the natural opening, which is indeed the intestine itself, and the body swells in the parts outside the cephalic.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And in some cases the intestine is forgotten and this hernia is called strangulated intestinal hernia, zirbal.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And in some cases it is done with the windbag (enema), and in some cases the intestine tears, and it remains, and this is a very serious danger to the patient, and in some cases it causes bad and worsening pain especially when it is pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the treatment of this disease, fear arises, so that care should be taken to avoid hunting in such a case.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	The method of the operation for such is to command the patient to return the intestine with his own hands inside its cavity, if he can, and to place a bandage over it on its backside, and raise the legs upwards.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	Place a bandage that cuts the opening of the scrotum in half, and cut through the scrotum completely from top to bottom; and insert two fingers into the incision as needed to divide the incision with them.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	If the incision is made according to the amount that you can possibly forget about that (the intestine).
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	Place the hernia sac outside the scrotum until the white hard cephalic is found in each part.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	You insert your finger into the hernia sac that is between the white cephalic and the testicle, and separate the cephalic according to its position, and free it from any adhesion that is in the back of the hernia sac.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	Place your hand on the scrotum in each part, and with that extend the white cephalic in each place with your left hand, and lift the testicle with the cephalic to the incision site; and command the assistant to stretch the hernia sac and you dissolve the adhesion that is behind it with complete solution.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	Search for any cause of the intestine being enveloped in the white hard cephalic.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	If you find such a cause, then remove it from the abdomen.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	Place a needle in which the thickness is six threads, and insert it through the back of the cephalic, which is below the scrotum, the incision; and cut the extremities that protrude from the thread until there are four threads, and place some stitches on them in the manner of a cross, and tie it strongly with two knots to the cephalic that we have mentioned which is below the scrotum.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	Place the ends of the threads and tie them strongly together to prevent any of the vessels that irrigate those areas from causing an abscess.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	Wait another period of time according to the first binding, about three days; and with these two bindings, leave the cephalic that is below the scrotum a thickness equal to the finger, and cut everything remaining roundly, and leave the testicle.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	Place an incision in the back of the scrotum according to the section that flows blood and pus as we have recommended in what has been said.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	Place a linen bandage soaked in oil and wait on the wound; and administer the binding that we have recommended (and sometimes the white cephalic is cauterized, which has been mentioned to prevent blood flow, as this often happens), and leave the binding until it falls off by itself.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	If hunting is delayed, soak the wound in hot water and wait on it until it falls off as we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	Care for the wound with the other care of wounds until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter 66.
De hernia ventosa.	On hernia ventosa (windbag).
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this hernia, no one has been seen to be cured by surgery.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	At first they said that the hernia due to water should be treated thus as we have recommended in hernia with urine; which is to tie the vessels near the incision with ease; and to cut in the middle where the abscess is formed around it, until the vessels fall off.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	Tend to the wound according to what has been said until it heals.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter 77.
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Of the incision made in the ankles.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Some frequent occurrences involve rupture in the ankles as we said before, and moreover...
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And do not allow the causes of hernias to reach the genitals; and if they do, it is rare; and always return them to their place.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	But if it lasts for a long time, a slit is made in the scrotum before the hernia enters the scrotum; this occurs due to the extension of the scrotum which is in the ankles as we said before, and this condition arises because the scrotum is extended, softened, and becomes inflamed and swollen.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the treatment for this is with cautery, as I will now explain.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And sometimes the treatment is performed by iron in this manner: and the patient lies on their back with their legs held apart, and the affected area of the hernia inflammation is dried out using linen cloths soaked in wine or vinegar, and then a small incision is made over the swelling with a knife according to the size of three fingers.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And apply a white linen cloth underneath the scrotum until it is exposed.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And take the rod and place it over the prominent part of the scrotum and press it against the lower abdomen.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And apply sutures to the two prominent areas at the end of the scrotum using a thread.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	And remove the end of the rod completely, and do not cut into the scrotum or extend the incision any further, nor cause any other damage as you know in treating an internal hernia.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	And treat that with the treatment of abscesses, and when you make the incision, cleanse it and restore the abscess to its original state until it is healed; for the scrotum contracts and the prominence of rupture is not corrected.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cautery is better in this location, as it is closer to health.
Capitol .lxviii.	Chapter LXVIII.
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	On the softening of the scrotum of the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	In certain men, the scrotum of the testicles becomes softened because the flesh between it is softened, and its treatment should be given attention to.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	Therefore, it is necessary for the one treating the condition to make the patient lie on his side, and completely separate the scrotum that has become softened from the natural scrotum; and then sew together two lips with stitches.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you wish, cut off the excess of the softened scrotum with three or four stitches and secure a firm stitch.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	Then close the incision between the stitches, and care for other afflictions until they are healed and the pain subsides.
Capitol .lxix.	Chapter 69.
De castracio.	On castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Know that castration is prohibited by our law, but for the sake of my memory I recall it in this book; and it is not necessary to remember it except in two ways: one because the doctor who is asked about it knows its treatment if it occurs; and the other way is that we often have need for castration of other animals for the benefit of our use, such as with horses, cattle, pigs, and similar animals.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And so I say that castration is performed in two ways: either by strangulation, or by incision and sectioning.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	But in the method of strangulation, the procedure is to seize the animal by its tail before its testicles are softened and lined up.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	Then hold them with your hand until they become resolved and do not appear again.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	But in castration by incision and sectioning, it is necessary that you have the animal and press the scrotum of the testicles with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	Then lift the spermatic cord and make an incision over each vessel to a depth of two fingers.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	And make an incision in any pus that you may have to drain it.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	Do not leave any cause for the abscess, but only the fine one that is on the veins.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	This method of castration is better when performed by strangulation because strangulation quickly eliminates any cause for the testicles to desire coit.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	Care for the wound until it heals.
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter 70.
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	On the treatment of hermaphrodism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphrodism in men occurs in two ways: one is when a gap appears in the scrotum between the testicles, and within it there is a conch-like formation that resembles female genitals with hairs.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And certain cases of a hernia in which urine collects in the scrotum.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	In women, there is a special case: and it is that the conch of a woman on the pelvis is similar to two testicles of a man with only a small part protruding from the vaginal opening like male genitals and two testicles.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	The treatment is in three types: for one type of men and for one type of women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	It is necessary to make an incision and drain the inflammation of that area until the condition improves, and then care for it with other treatments.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	In the second type of male ailment where urine is in the scrotum of the testicles, there is neither cure nor operation on it.
Capitol .xxi.	Capitulo xxi. (in English: Chapter XXI)
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	Of prolonged and prominent flesh due to female causes.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	Prolonged swelling due to natural causes is reduced and properly treated with the right regimen, but sometimes it becomes exacerbated in certain women so much that it spreads like in men and reaches the vagina.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Therefore, you should remove the excess swelling with your hand or oil and incise it.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And do not continue incising, especially at the root of the lesion, to avoid bleeding.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	And take care of that wound until it heals.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	Flesh born is flesh that grows within the womb of a woman until it fills it up, and prolonged swelling is like this (and for this reason some people call it “caudated disease”); therefore we incise it as we would an abscess, and treat it until it heals.
Capitol .lxxii.	Capitolo LXXII. (in English: Chapter LXXII)
De curacio de alratica.	Of the treatment of arthritis.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	Arthritis is a condition where the cervix does not open or it is narrow.
E es o natural o accidental.	It can be either natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	Accidental is due to disease that has occurred before, and it is caused either by swelling of the flesh not properly reduced or by cysts that are subtle or large.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	It is caused either in the root of the uterus or in its costae (or sides), or on the superficial pus or deep pus, and it forbids coitus, engagement, and conception, and strongly prohibits menstruation.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	The recognition of this condition is made by the midwife if the opening is visible, but if it is not, you must seek for it with fingers or with a rod.
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	If the opening is due to a subtle cyst that is close to the two labiae, you must break it and separate it.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	This means that you place your fingers between the two labiae, and indicate with both hands in which direction to proceed.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	The woman lies on her back with her legs extended and you spread the two labiae apart with force until that subtle cyst is broken and the opening is opened up.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	Take wool, dip it in oil and place it over the area, and leave it for a day to ensure that the incision site does not become consolidated.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	But if the cyst is large and thick, you must incise it with a spatula or a leaf of myrtle.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	But if the opening is due to fibrosis, you must suspend it with oil and incise it.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	And use the medications that stop bleeding without causing pain, such as henbane, dragon's blood, and poppy seeds, mixed with albumen of egg whites.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	And administer a wide lead cannula to ensure that the wound does not heal easily.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	Keep it for several days and administer hot water poultices.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	And let it be cured by other methods of consolidation until it is healed.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	Sometimes the uterus expels other fleshy substances during childbirth, and it is necessary to incise them according to this method.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	But if it is an abscess containing cancerous matter in the uterus, do not apply iron to it in any way.
Capitol .lxxiii.	Capitolo LXXIII. (in English: Chapter LXXIII)
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	Of the treatment of hemorrhoids, tail (prolapsed rectum) and red botch that may occur in the cervix of women.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids are recognized in the openings of large veins where blood continues to flow from them; and chronic hemorrhoids should be treated as thrombosed hemorrhoids (?).
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	I have already mentioned in the division the species of these [conditions] and their signs, and I will say thus those that receive treatment and those that do not receive treatment.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	And now I will tell you about those that are internal in the mother's womb and do not appear to the senses, therefore there should be no treatment done with iron for them.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	But those that are in the openings of the mother's womb, where you can touch them, are those that are cured.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	And it is necessary that you put the woman into warm water and apply mustard oil or linen cloth with sharp scissors or rough wool and cut them with the blade of the scissors.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	And apply powder on them made from the blood of one of the incisive teeth with a mortar and pestle, such as arnica and similar [plants].
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	Then wrap her feet in cloth for an hour and then place it in cold water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if the bleeding persists, then make a decoction of camomile, wormwood, milkwort, and yarrow, and similar [plants].
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	Then take barley flour mixed with honey and wine, and make an ointment of it to be applied on the thighs.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	And if the bleeding is separated, that is good; otherwise, make it adhere with two bandages, and to the breasts with scarification.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And take wool and dip it in the juice of coltsfoot or comfrey or goldenrod wine, and apply it to the place; and cure the place with a mouth rinse until it is healed.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	But if the tooth that needs to be extracted is sharp and hard to remove, you should cut it as indicated in the previous section.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And heal that place until it is healed.
Capitol .lxxiv.	Chapter LXXIV.
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	Chapter on the perforation of accidental hernia in the mother.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Types of abscesses that occur in the mother, such as cancer, tooth abscess, ulcers, boils, carbuncles, erysipelas, fistulas, anal fissures and other abscesses.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	And I have already mentioned these diseases, their types, and their signs, as well as their cures, in the previous section.
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	And in this treatise I will talk about the cauterization of an abscess in the mother that is associated with a healthy abscess and if you want to know how to perform the operation on it with iron.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	Therefore, you must consider whether the pain of the abscess at its onset is sharp with a blow and fever and swelling, and if it does not show signs of worsening, then do not perform perforation of it; instead, heal it with liquids that help in maturation until the symptoms subside.
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	Then you must perform the incision on a woman lying on a table with two legs, and lower her back, place her feet at the edge of the table far from the abdomen, spread her thighs apart, and place her arms on either side of her neck, and each one should be bound to what is appropriate.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	And after the mother follow the right side and provide the instruments necessary to open the opening of the womb; the shape of which will come in those cases that are appropriate.
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And when you want to use this instrument, you must position it at the opening of the womb on the woman, and nothing that comes out from the instrument into the womb should be more than the opening of the womb itself and the hand of the sick person.
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	But if the instrument is larger than the opening of the womb, then you must place powder on the texture of the opening of the womb so that no instrument can enter into the opening of the womb.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	And you must stop the flow of fluid that flows out from the instrument on top and the one who provides the instrument should turn it until it is inserted into the opening of the womb.
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	And when the incision is made and it is touched with the hand and moistened, then you must cauterize its head with a hot iron rod.
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	And when the discharge is evacuated, then you must apply a plaster immersed in rose oil or other ointment containing some herbs on the incision in the womb and hold the cloth over the opening of the womb.
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	And then close the woman's belly with clean wool immersed in water boiled with herbs.
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	Then let it be treated for about two days with an enema, which is appropriate until it is healed.
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	Some intervals are washed (the anus and the wound) with water and honey, and then with water in which is crushed a rational amount of licorice root or long-acting oil, and then returned to the enema.
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	And if the wound is inside the anus and swollen, then it is necessary for you to abstain from treatment with iron, having care from what has been said in the previous section.
Capitol .lxxv.	Chapter LXXV.
A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	To teach midwives in what manner the afterbirth should be medicated when it is born abnormally according to its figure.
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	It is necessary for the midwife to recognize at the beginning the figure of normal delivery by signs from it, and when you see the woman push at the birth and desire to smell the air, and it is scraped off by what is above her in delivery, and she quickly delivers the afterbirth, then you know that this birth is according to a natural figure, and its appearance on its head, and the second one with or suspended or hanging from the navel.
Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.	Therefore, when you see these signs, it is necessary that the abdomen of it be compressed so that the afterbirth descends gently because if they descend on their head, the second one will descend with it, and it should be cleaned with good cleansing.
Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu .i., o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.	But if the afterbirth is abnormal and unnatural because when it is born on its feet and the body of it is born before its head and its feet, and one hand (or foot), or the head of it and one hand (or foot) is born, or in the abdomen of it, and it is forcibly turned over its neck, and similar to the unnatural figures of it.
Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.	It is necessary for the midwife to be wise and subtle in all those causes, and to guard against error and deception.
E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.	And I will show you the entire figure of it, and what method is in it for it to be understood and remain on that.
Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.	When the effluxion (of afterbirth) is born on its head by natural expulsion, and it is violent towards the woman and difficult to deliver, and sometimes the strength of it has already weakened, then do the scissors, or what the women have, and evaporate the congealed blood from it with fenugreek oil.
E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.	And the midwife enters between her teeth a small spatula and cuts through the second one (afterbirth), or dries it with her nail up to where the moisture in it runs out.
E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.	And press the woman's abdomen until it descends the afterbirth.
Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	But if it does not descend, then the woman must be washed with the mucus of chicken and mucus of fenugreek with a razor.
E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.	And command it to be compressed, washed, and made to vomit with a mixture of the following; then put your mouth on it and its nose for an hour because the afterbirth will quickly pass through.
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	And if the two ends of the afterbirth are quickly forgotten at the beginning, then you must reduce them with gradual ease.
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	But if the instrument does not enter, then the woman should rest on a chair and raise her legs, and the chair should be moved over the ground; and the woman should be held so as not to fall too hard.
E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.	And if the ends are not turned inside out and the afterbirth dies, then you incise them and extract the rotten part of the afterbirth or pull the body to the hand with cloth and extract it equally, because that will quickly pass through.
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	Of the appearance of the afterbirth on its feet.
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	When the afterbirth is born on its feet, then it is necessary for you to press them upwards, and turn the afterbirth into a small ball, and hold it together, and take one foot of it and stretch it gradually.
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	When he is inside the thighs, command him to express himself and make him turn around with a condition, because it will be forgotten if God wishes.
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	If it is not forgotten as we have recommended, then you return the little thing bit by bit inside that second figure naturally, because it will be forgotten with slight effort.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	If everything we have recommended is prohibited, then take alum and dissolved gum, and grind them well in a mortar with good percussion, and apply the paste to the woman's lower abdomen.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	Then mix that paste in tepid water until the hypogastric hernia is reached.
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	And when the parts around it are relaxed, then subject him to a fumigation of myrtle and make him rest in that position.
E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.	And when the fumigation lasts for an hour, then make him vomit by mixing the paste on a tray and making him strain his mouth, removing it, and pressing gently on the lower part of the abdomen with slight compression, because the matter will soon be forgotten.
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	Immediately place his hands on top of his thighs.
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	When the matter comes out in this manner, then you insert your fingers little by little into his anus; and the woman should be leaning over his neck, with her legs hanging down, and they should be lying on a bed, and she should hold his hands.
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.	And press gently on the abdomen of him little by little and extract what is between his toes from the anus, until it is prepared in the rectum below.
E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	And if the matter is not forgotten, then take his feet and shake them vigorously, and press gently on the hypogastric hernia little by little towards the rectum above.
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	Then insert your fingers and press gently on the matter little by little, and command the woman to express herself until the matter is forgotten.
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	Immediately hold onto the matter longitudinally with one of his hands.
Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.	Try to reduce the hand of him, but if you cannot do so, then raise the woman and make her run.
E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.	And if she cannot run, then make her lie down on the bed and hit the joints of him with vigorous percussion and promptly administer the remedies that I have recommended for lubricants.
E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.	If the birth has begun, then make her vomit on a tray and study the reduction of the hand, and insert it according to its natural figure, and make her strain and command him to contract himself until it is forgotten.
Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.	Immediately place the matter on his neck, with the opening of him at his mother's chest.
Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.	Make sure that the midwife holds the hand of him and gently rotate it little by little with ease.
E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.	And when it is rotated and rotated, then pause on the cervix of him with the oil and lubricants that we have recommended.
E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.	And command him to push little by little and when you have done so, make her vomit on a tray and command her to lean over the right side, and command him to contract himself; and make her strain with a condition.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	The fetus is prepared on the right side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When the mother is having labor in this manner, consider it, and then incise the second membrane with your nail up to the point of being drained of its moisture.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	And if the fetus is hanging on the face and neck of him, incise the umbilical cord to ensure it does not remain and die.
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	And press the fetus gently into the rectum up to the point that it comes out and command the woman to contract herself, and it will be forgotten with slight ease if God wishes.
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	Birth of twins or multiple fetuses.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	Know that twins are usually born in labor, and sometimes three or four, but this is rare and unfortunate; however, it is due to nature, not human action.
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And separate the second membrane, whether it is multiple or not, using scissors, and distinguish each fetus by cutting its umbilical cord. Sometimes they are forgotten as if they were a single birth due to natural ease, but sometimes they are born unacceptably as we have recommended.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	If a difficult case arises for them, you must sedate them and eventually reach the point that was previously described in terms of abnormalities. At this point, you should treat them as we have advised.
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	The subtle and smooth midwife does what is needed for ease, subtlety, and delay, and is clever according to every figure prepared by the art of healing.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	Remembering that which forms in the womb from embryos and are aborted.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	There are certain days that occur at the end of one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten, and sometimes even more, and it is necessary to check that a woman has given birth after twenty-five or thirty weeks, which was caused by measurement of the wise.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	All this indicates that the midwife should be aware that similar cases may appear and act accordingly.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter LXXVI (76 in Roman numerals).
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	On extracting a dead fetus.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When treating a dead fetus as mentioned in the division of medicine and it has not been expelled yet, you must determine if the woman is of good moral character and not subject to any accidents that are feared for her safety.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	The woman should be positioned lying on her left side, and her head should be tilted downward, with her hips raised.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	The assistant should hold the woman's legs together or tie them to her left side, so that the body does not extend during the removal of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	Then you should moisten the mother's mouth with warm oil and honey, aloe vera, fennel seed, and herbs.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	Then lubricate the midwife's hands with those oils and emollients, insert her hand with ease into the woman, and position herself at the location where she will grip the fetus.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	Choose the appropriate location: therefore you must consider if the fetus is prepared to be extracted from its head or another part. In such a case, grasp it by the heels, neck, mouth, palate, beard, shoulder blades, ribs, or hips, or near the loins.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	However, if the fetus is positioned feet-first, grab it by the heels or middle of the back.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	The hand should grip the fetus with the fingers, maintaining the curvature at the point between the mentioned fingers of the left hand, and insert the hand gently to reach one of the locations mentioned earlier until the cause is achieved.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	Then stop and position another hand on the fetus, or a third if necessary, to ensure that it is pulled inwards rather than extended along its length.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	The pain should be eased everywhere, so that its intensity is reduced just as it is done in tooth extraction by removing it.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	Cover it with something soft, so that the extension is softened; and if any part of it is retained, then it is necessary to have the midwife anoint some oil on her fingers and insert them skillfully into that area and turn what is retained.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	If the delivery is forgotten (mistakenly left incomplete), then the midwife's fingernails should be trimmed and inserted into the place that is deeper inside, doing this until everything is expelled.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if the hand is out of position and cannot be reduced by manipulation, then fabricate a bandage around it; and extract it slowly until everything is expelled, either at the joint of the hand or in the pelvis.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And do the same to the other hand and both feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the head of the fetus is large or it occurs that the head is compressed in the birth canal, or the water sac of the fetus is not properly positioned, then insert between the two spine-like objects and split the head and extract the water, or cut it with an instrument called "alundat", whose shape will be described in the chapter that follows.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	Do the same if the fetus naturally has a large head: and then insert a hook or catch it with an alundat as previously mentioned, and extract the bones using forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	If the head is out and compressed by the pelvis, then it should be cut open so that the moisture within the pelvis can drain.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if there are no complications or excessive swelling of the cervix, you should insert the head as soon as it is possible for you.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	If the abdomen is protruding or there is edema in it, then you should perform a perforation to drain the moisture that is inside.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the fetus is on its feet, then the attraction and direction of it to the mouth of the mother should be light.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	But if it is compressed in the abdomen and pelvis, then you should extract it with a cloth that you have wrapped around your hand, and cut open the abdomen and pelvis so that moisture that is inside can drain.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	If other limbs remain and the head returns, then the midwife should insert her left hand; but if the mouth of the mother is blocked, she should insert her hand into the perineum, seek the head with it, pull it towards the mouth of the mother, and insert one or two fingers, pulling it with them.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mouth of the mother is blocked by an edema that occurs at the urethra, do not force it too much; instead, you should administer a moist, oily solution.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	Apply plasters; and continue to care for the patient in waters that soften and moisten.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	If the fetus is on the patient's side, attempt to insert it as much as possible if feasible; and administer the solution previously mentioned for a live fetus.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	If that is not possible, then cut it into pieces and extract it.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	You must not leave any cause of the second one (infection).
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	When you have completed your work, then administer the solution previously mentioned for the treatment of postpartum infections that occur in the mother.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	If there is bleeding, then stop it with styptic waters and administer the other treatment.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	I have seen a woman whose stomach contained a dead fetus, and on top of that fire, another observation was made, and the fetus was already dead.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	There has been an edema in the patient's belly for a long time; it has swollen so much that it is now producing pus.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	I was called to treat him and have been treating him for a long time, but the wound has not healed.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I applied strong adhesive plasters to him, and extracted an object that was believed to be a bone, but after several days another bone was extracted; I was astonished because there were no bones in the abdomen.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought they might have been from the dead fetus's bones.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	So I cauterized the wound and extracted many small bones, the woman continued to live in this manner for a long time, but developed a small fracture in one arm.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	I did not think it was strange because in such cases knowledge and skill with the hand are useful to treat this.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	On the shapes of the instruments that are necessary to extract the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	The shape of a loop used to open the mother's cervix:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the shape of a clamp used to hold the forceps, with two prongs at the ends of two rods.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	This virtue must be very subtle and made of strictor or from poppy seed or from the root of birch tree.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	Let the length of each rod be two fingers and the width of both be one finger, and the length of each is one palm and a half; and in the middle of two rods there should be two adjustments of that rod which are already firm, the length of which is equal to the width of one palm and slightly more, and the width of each is two fingers or slightly more.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	These two adjustments should be inserted into the mother's mouth to keep it open when you apply the prescribed virtues.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Make another substance similar to that, but slightly heavier:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	Make it with rods of poppy seed or birch root as with forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	However, on the end of it (the rod), there should be two adjustments similar to this, and the length of those adjustments is equal to one palm, and the width of each is two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	When you want to open the mother, first lay the woman on a bed with her feet hanging down, and open what is between her thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	Then insert your hand with the instrument similar to forceps as you would with tongs, according to the depth that you assess based on the size of the mother's mouth and the amount that the cervix dilates.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The ancient remedy that I will tell you about:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	A remedy to induce labor:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Remedy for the elimination of a large head:
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	It is similar to forceps at the end, as sometimes, and some of the times it is made long like forceps according to this shape, as sometimes, at the end of which are inserted and crushed like teeth of a saw with which it is cut and broken.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Remedy for reducing excess fluid:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	Remedy for pulling out a splinter:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	Remedy for removing two splinters:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	Form of forceps having teeth of closure with the head of the tool being rounded:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	Form of forceps having two prongs with the head being cut off:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Form of two spatulas flat:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All those instruments are exercised, and when more of that kind are multiplied and the species prepared, the craftsmen should make it as light in operation and as small in quantity as possible for men.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And the works of those instruments must be carried out, regardless of whether they are small or large, for the necessity of them is not excusable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	On the extraction of the second tooth:
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the second tooth is retained, the child must be commanded to hold its breath, and then you must make it sneeze with care, and place your hand over its mouth and nose, and if by doing so it has escaped, that is good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	If not, then you take a potion and perforate the covering with a hole and place it over the mother's mouth so that the herbs penetrate the mouth calmly, roughly, aniseed, camomile, arabic gum, cassia bark, and sweet woodruff.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All these herbs or some of them are immersed in water in the potion, and it is placed over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And place a tube of cane in the mother's mouth, and let it remain until the vapor reaches the cavity of the mother.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And make it sneeze as we have said, and the second tooth will be expelled quickly.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	But if the treatment persists and the second tooth does not come out, then command the midwife to immerse her left hand in oil of sesame or in alum powder, and insert it into the cavity with care so that the second tooth is found, and when it has been found, take it out bit by bit but carefully so that the mother does not strain herself excessively.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	It must be immobilized on the right and left sides with ease.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And it should be adjusted in the amount of force, for it will obey and escape from adhesion.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	If the mother's mouth is narrowed, we have already recommended the treatment with sneezing and the potion of water with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	But if it is not expelled by all the causes that we have recommended, then be careful not to tire yourself in attempting to extract it repeatedly, but rather let what comes out of her mouth lie in the female's cavity and anoint it with saliva and tetraformication; for it will become soft and dissolved in a few days and be expelled.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when it becomes soft, raise the bad humors to the head and stomach, and let the patient suffer from this; then it is necessary to administer sub-fumigation and suitable remedies.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	But one of the ancients has already spoken about fumigation with garlic and dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	Form of instrument for female fumigation to retain menstruation and the second tooth:
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	Made of iron or clay.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And the thin end should be placed in the cavity and the wide end on the fire, and the fumigation should be placed over the arms of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And let it remain until that fumigation is consumed and another is prepared.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	Treatment for the unborn child's anus:
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	Newborn children and unperforated anuses, which are soft and oily.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Then the midwife should perforate it with the tool mentioned above; if not, then perforate it with a sharp spatula and be careful not to touch the intestines.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And place a wool soaked in wine and oil on it, and anoint it with saliva until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear that it is oily, place a tube in the hole for several days and stop it when the child wants to defecate.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And occlusion of the anus occurs due to ulcers or abscesses; then it is necessary to incise that consolidation and treat it with what we have said about the cure and lead.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	Treatment for fistulas that run downwards.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	Fistulas that run downward in the lower part are nodular and swollen, which run towards the anus outside or in the space of one partition.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is a fistula or abscess.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And when that nodule is old and runs with foul, white, or putrid discharge, some abscesses of this type may perforate.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	Those penetrations are recognized by what is exuded from them through discharge and wind; sometimes the patient experiences discharge, and the worm is often strong in those cases.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	Sometimes those fistulas can be observed penetrating into the bladder space and into the meat of the penis, and sometimes they penetrate into the joint of the hip and into the navel.

Fistula penetrating into the anus but not outside is known as when you insert your finger in the anus and try to find the fistula with a subtle probe or iron, if it is not treacherous.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if there is treachery in that, then insert a probe made of lead or horsehair into it until you feel the probe or hair with your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	If you do not feel it at all or you do not find any cause for discharge, worms, or wind as mentioned above, then you should know that it is not penetrating and you can proceed with treatment.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	When the fistula penetrates into the bladder or the penis meat, its meaning is evidently that it is of urine and it is forbidden to use that place with medicine until the area has been consolidated.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	But if it penetrates into the joint of the hip or bone and pain is encountered in the area, this signifies that if the probe can enter the bone without treachery, pain will be felt in the surrounding area; that pus forms quickly; and that no medication works there, nor does it heal with salve.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those penetrating fistulas, there is no cure for them all, and the cure of these is the labor and futility of foolish doctors over which they are obsessed.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	But in the one that is not penetrating and is not old, healing with iron is hoped for as I will recommend to you, and what I have already proven.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	It is that the patient lies between your hands over his chest and raises his legs upwards, so that the thighs are inclined towards his stomach, and then insert a probe of lead or iron (if the fistula is not treacherous) to find its location.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	If the patient feels pain around the neck, then you should insert your finger in his neck.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	If you feel the probe penetrating by itself, or if you feel it between your finger and that tissue or flesh, then you will certainly know that it is penetrating; therefore do not work on it, for there is no healing in it as mentioned above.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	But some still say that it heals in certain men.
