The medicine that is hoped to help in this case is that you ignite a fine cautery according to the size of the fistula, as mentioned earlier, and insert it into the fistula until it reaches around the neck; then you rotate it two or three times until you know that all the tissues adjacent to the fistula, similar to goose feathers, have been tightened.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	Wrap it with bandages until all the tissues that have been tightened can be seen, and treat it with a medication to nourish and consolidate the flesh, and if it heals, that is good; otherwise, it is not cured in a certain amount of time by another treatment.
E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	If the probe is inside and does not penetrate your finger in the anus, but there is a tissue or flesh covered by it, and sometimes the fistula appears to be covered by the skin, then dry the skin from the beginning of the fistula and you will see that the skin dries with the probe, and continue until the incision reaches the location where the end of the probe emerges, and through the probe it is freed and caught.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	Wash those fistulous tissues which are similar to goose feathers and remain without any cause.
Mays si flux de sanc vezes que vengua entre tu e la tua opperacio quan ensideysses aquelas carns, lahoras le milh que sia e del pus leugier instrument es cauterizar am foc o am medicina acuta, quar cauteri am foc ajusta bonas doas habitutz: so es adhustio de aquelas carns ajustadas, e abscizio del sanc exseccacio de las humiditatz.	But if blood flow sometimes comes out between you and your action when incising those tissues, then the remedy is to apply milk or a mild instrument for cauterization with fire or sharp medicine, as cauterization with fire provides good healing: it consolidates those tightened tissues and abscesses the excess bleeding of fluids.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	Wrap it with bandages or splints until the place heals, and treat the wound with hard salve to nourish and consolidate it.
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	These are medications with astringent and drying properties; when it is restored, it has been healed and there will be no recurrence.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	But if the fistula has penetrated the rectum of the anus and is elongated on the surface of the body, then insert your finger into the anus and examine it with that.
E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa.	And thus if the probe and you are close to flesh or tissue, and it is almost penetrating, then there is no operation in that place but rather by trust and hope.
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	The cause of this is to administer it in one of three ways: either cauterize it as mentioned before; or make an incision until you achieve the cavity so that it becomes possible for you to enter and treat it directly; do not proceed with incision for fear of piercing the rectum and causing harm directly to the patient, and instead treat it with what has been said as it is a strong healer; or elongate the membrane or remove the pus that is incised near the anus, as mentioned before, or with the probe or another sharp instrument, and then clean those fistulous tissues which are in the incision, and finally force yourself to heal the entire wound by continuing to incise it, and if the abscess pus does not consolidate above the anus, and the fistula remains open in the part of the anus, it will be more easily irritated by the patient.
E alscunas veguadas la fistula es finida segon aquesta manieyra: es quan tu entrometas la tenta en la fistula, e es en le latz del cul entorn la superficia del cos am la codena e en le marge del cul, lahoras pren tenta de perforada extremitat, que es ayssi cum agulha de preparantz les coers segon aquesta forma:	And at some times the fistula is closed according to this method: it is when you insert a probe into the fistula, and at the edge of the anus around the body's surface with a cord, and at the margin of the anus, then take a probe of perforating extremity, which is thus like a needle for preparing wounds in this manner:
e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	And insert a probe into it, surrounded by five threads or around the threads; then insert the probe into the fistula until it achieves its cavity.
Mays si es penetrant en le marge del cul prop dedintz, lahoras tu extratz le fiel de aquel trauc ayssi que tu intrometas le tieu dit en le cul; e extraguas la extremitat del fiel e ajustes las duas extremitatz essemps, e estrenh cascuna, e leyssa aquo per un dia o per dos, e quan mays inscideys le fiel en la carn, estrenh be aquel entro que aquelas carns sian inscididas las quals so entre doas extremitatz del fiel e que cajan.	But if you penetrate the edge of the anus deeply, then you draw out the thread from that hole as you insert your finger into the anus; extract the end of the thread and adjust both ends, tighten each one, let it be for a day or two, and when the thread sinks more into the flesh, tighten it further until those flesh parts which are between the two ends of the thread and fall into place.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia consolidada e sanada.	Then care for the wound until it is healed and consolidated.
Mays si le orrifici de la fistula no es penetrant, lahoras fay aquel penetrar, en qualque manieyre sia a tu preparat, sino que sia mot en le preon, quar no es a tu que fassas aquo per que no inscidas le lacert; e aprop fay am aquela entro que sia sanada.	But if the openings of the fistula are not penetrating, make them penetrate, using any method you prefer, but do not cause pain, because it is not your job to do this so that they do not become inflamed; then let it heal until it is healed.
La forma de spatum spinos am lo qual es fenduda la fistula: la curvitat del qual es mot aguda e l’autra partida es no-aguda, per so que no inscidas aquo que no es necessari, ayssi cum vezes.	The way to use a spined spatula for closing the fistula: its curved part is sharp and the other part is not, so that it does not penetrate unnecessarily, as sometimes happens.
De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	The stitching of hemorrhoids where blood flows from the incision of those.
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Hemorrhoids are of two kinds, either like coal near the anus, or as if they were filled with grease from radishes.
E de aquelas so petitas e grans, e que le sanc corr de aquelas tostemps e es una, e so motas, e so fora·l cul, e en las extremitatz de lu.	And they can be small and large, and blood flows from them constantly, and they are one kind, and they are multiple, and they extend outside the anus, and at their ends.
Mays empero aquelas que so foro le cul so segon las mes de pauca humiditat, de las quals corr aygua citrina o un petit de sanc am cos continuabla, e so segon la color del cos.	But those that extend outside the anus are in months with little moisture, which discharge clear water or a small amount of blood with continuous flow, and their color is according to the body.
E la curacio de aquela que es dedintz le cuol es que comandes al malaute que se assela e que se exprema entro que le cuol yesca e las emoroydas apparescan a tu. Adonc tu te coyte e suspen am uncis o que tenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, e aprop incideys aquelas deves las suas razitz.	Then you cut and suspend them with scissors or what you have available, using your nail, and then cauterize the roots of those.
Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	But if scissors are not available for those due to their moisture and softening of those, then take them with rough cloth or leather or woolen cloth, extract those with your fingers, and then cauterize those and sprinkle some caustic powders near the incision on them, so that they are in place of cautery; or cauterize those according to what is preceded in the chapter on cauterization.
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And care for those with other treatment until they are healed.

And if the anus does not open, you crush the patient with a crutch with slight biting, and wash it with the water that is in the anus and causes the anus to open slightly when the patient squeezes it gently.

And for those who have incisions, you should provide suturing of them according to this method: take a probe wrapped in thread and insert it with a needle and then extract the hemorrhoids to the upper part, and make the probe penetrate into the side of the other part with the needle, and wrap the two ends of the probe longitudinally around the part below the needle, and tie the hemorrhoid strongly, and knot the thread and remove the needle.
E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	And do this to all of them, leaving one and not sewing it, so that the excess blood can flow from there.

De curacio de fistulas.	Treatment of fistulas.
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	Occasionally, occurrences happen due to the drying up of a wound or due to natural constriction.

De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	Treatment of almsir (abscess), is essential.
Sapias que alamermar, so es clau, e no es si no notz redon segon la color del cors semblant a cap de claviel, e es fayt en tot le cors e majorment en las partidas dejos les pes e als ditz, e endeve per aquels dolor deves le anament. E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	And if you wish, cauterize the following which is mentioned in its own chapter.
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	Moreover, a wart is a small rough, round fistula on the surface of the body, and it often appears in children's fingers.

Moreover, a scab is a small or large rough fistula on the surface of the body that moves on the skin and when touched it turns into a pustule similar to an ant bite, and it grows around the body.

The treatment is to use a lancet or a needle with a sharp tip, and press it over the pus-filled blister to contain its circle around the area; then rotate your hand with the lancet inside to incise what is in the circle of the scab, and press it on the skin, and remove the scab from its root.
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	And if you wish, do that with an iron or steel needle in this manner:
Sia la partida desus de la canulha trahent a subtilitat, sorda (so es no-perforada), envolopada per so que sobre le dit la aprencio de lu sia ablaviada e la revolucio de aquela.
